HBO Max Support", 'modified': '2022-09-20T04:38:34Z'}
title: Skipping the ends of episodes and making me watch multiple sets of ads to get back to where I was
review: It’s been doing this multiple times.  There will be eight minutes left in an episode and it will just start the next one.  Then with all the ads it takes almost 10 minutes to get back to the spot.  Then it happens again two minutes later.  I just gave up after spending about half an hour trying to watch the last 5 minutes of a show.

title: Deleting Animation
review: As a fellow animation fan I am absolutely disgusted of HBO Max’s decision to delete shows that people loved and animators, directors, writers, SPENT YEARS working on. Your decision to get rid of these shows is selfish and crazy. Obviously I will not support HBO Max with this rash decision to throw away what most people get the app to watch. When I first downloaded the app, I was so excited to watch Cartoon Networks Infinity Train and get to watch one of my favorite shows, OK KO, but now I can’t even watch either of those?? This was definitely a decision made for money, but why would you get rid of shows that made people happy?!?

title: Service is good, but the app is bad
review: The service is good with many selections, including many foreign shows.  But the app is just bad.  One the controls take too much space.  Two, the navigation control is horrible.  Cannot navigate back to episode list without going back multiple screens.  Finally, on iPad and connected to a external TV or Monitor, some pop ups show up only on the external monitor.  And these pop ups blocks access and only have the dismiss button tied to it, so you cannot dismiss the pop up.  Only way is to force kill the app and start it again.

title: App is glitchy on an iPad, iPhone 11
review: I’m not sure I understand why this app cannot be fixed. I have read negative reviews on it, going back months, and yet the experience is still poor. It took me four hours last night to get through one episode of And Just Like That… which was a 40-minute episode. The app froze every 30 seconds and took minutes to reload each time. I’m running the latest updates on each device and yet the experience is still poor. I’m trying to watch another show now, and the experience is still the same.

Thanks, HBO Max Customer Support", 'modified': '2022-01-15T03:26:31Z'}
title: Movies switch subscription levels half way into them
review:
Hey! Brand new account holder. 
I’m able to get over the buggy nature of the app. Some of it is just getting used to the features and I know development is ongoing. 

However, I was recently watching a movie and had to stop half way into it for the day. The next day (today), HBO tells me that this movie is now only available with a more expensive service. That’s completely awful business practice and very much BATE AND SWITCH!! I’m removing the services and telling everyone I know about this unless this issue is resolved swiftly.

title: If I could give 0 stars I would
review: Love the content but the app is by far the WORST STREAMING APP OF ALL TIMES. I subscribe from time to time to see if they’ve made it work better but nope! Chronically disappointed. Constantly pausing what your watching, errors, app takes forever to open up, when it does open trying to click on the show you want or watch usually doesn’t respond by opening so you have to force quit and keep trying and hopefully you’ll get lucky and it will play. I could go on and on. It’s not my internet connection, every other app works with no issues.

title: Skips ahead
review:
Love the selection. However, whenever the app glitches, I have to reopen it to play and it skips way far ahead. Really ruins the experience when you’re paying for something. Worse than buffering online ten years ago. Developers, stop telling people to turn on and off their modem and fix your own app. Look at your ratings. It’s you.

Edit:
Standard we’ll share your response. Oh hypocrisy: use this form to share feedback.

title: Fix airplay streaming to Apple TV’s!
review: Trying to get this app to stream to apple TV using airplay is infuriating. It constantly says that my internet connection is bad (it’s not because it works just fine for every app except the HBO max one) when I try to connect or that an error occurred loading this content. The only reason I have to do this is because they don’t support my older Apple TV’s which works just fine so I have to use airplay to stream it rather than use an app in the apple tv. Why should I upgrade if my Apple TV works just fine for everything else except for HBO max?!

title: Pretty good, almost VERY good
review: The selection on HBO Max is second to none. Tons of content and always adding new content can keep you binging forever. The issue I have is the native app on a smart tv. I lag less my air playing my iPad from the mobile app onto my tv than I do streaming directly from the tv and for some reason that math just doesn’t add up. But regardless when it does get going, incredible!

title: Great selection, embarrassing App.
review: Love love LOVE the selection on HBO max. That being said, the apps across various platforms are just embarrassingly bad for such a great selection of movies. The screen a turns dark as if I clicked on the screen but I haven’t. I watch it on my Xbox and sometimes the ads won’t load so I have to load it on another device, watch the ad, then let it sync up on my tv, hit play, and then hope that it’s skipped over the ad and I can keep watching. Idk any platform that has a working, non-buggy App.

review: It has lots of options and lot of shows to watch but it’s very buggy, mainly buggy whenever I’m trying to watch on TV but it’ll freeze up or say “can’t play title” so have to reset the app several times, it’s extra bad when it comes around to the commercial breaks. BUGS NEED TO BE FIXED HBOMAX . I am getting tired of my show freezing up on every ad that it has, and then sometimes not playing my show at all. Fix it already

title: I’m really tired of it crashing beyond help every big premiere
review: So it’s been two days of it not working, not being able to sign in, having to install and reinstall and uninstall and reinstall and finally the FIFTH time through it magically works again.  This has happened EVERY TIME a GOT premiere has happened.  The old versions and this new crap, sorry, app.  Every time.  Nine seasons.  Nine times.  Suddenly the app doesn’t work.  Suddenly I’m signed out.  Suddenly it’s a mystery problem.  It’s like this teeny little company (ha ha ha) can’t help but give it’s subscribers a middle finger.  Ridiculous and infuriating.

title: Great selection, terrible user experience
review: The available selection leaves not much to be desired. Some of my favorite shows and movies are on this network. Unfortunately, the app won’t open on my phone. I’ve updated it and my newer model iPhone, deleted the app, re-downloaded, turned my phone on and off, cleared the cache, tried running off of data (I have unlimited), switched to wifi... seems like something that’s meant to provide entertainment shouldn’t feel like work.

If you have any additional questions, please reach out to us at hbom.ax/contact so we can take a closer look with you.', 'modified': '2022-03-17T20:24:13Z'}
title: Great content, terrible app
review:
This app does a great job, if its goal is to make me wonder whether I should stop watching HBO.

The process for downloading shows to watch later (which is the only reason I would use it vs my Apple TV) is abusively buggy.  

A typical example:  I am presently trying to download a show or two to watch.  I am on my fourth attempt, after it has failed the download, or decided to pause the download, or says it is downloading or isn’t.  

And I know from past experience it is about 50/50 whether it will actually play once I’m there, or give me a mysterious error, or just crash the app.

Oh, and I have a bunch of other stuff I’ve downloaded which I’d like to watch - but hitting “renew” when asked…does absolutely nothing as far as I can tell.   So I need to delete them and re-download them and GOTO NIGHTMARISH STEP 1.

title: Apple version of app is garbage
review: If I could give this app negative stars, I would. HBO Max as a service is awesome. I have no issues streaming HBO Max via the PS version of the app or the Google TV version of the app. The Apple version I use on my iPad, however, is just trash. Videos don’t load, controls are non responsive, and on the rare occasion a video actually loads, I get the buffering problems I’ve read about in other reviews so the video might as well not even load. If I cast from my iPad to another device like my TV, the audio (if a video actually loads) is out of synch. Hot garbage all around.

If those don't work, please reach out to us at hbom.ax/contact for additional support. Thank you. HBO Max Support", 'modified': '2022-02-09T04:17:51Z'}
title: Glitches… interface
review:
Airplay doesn’t work with downloaded content. “Can’t play title. We’re having trouble playing this video…” but the video plays just fine on my iPad when AirPlay is off. Fix this ASAP. 

Why do I have to select a profile EVERY SINGLE TIME the app launches? 😡😣😒 What makes even less sense is why does this even occur when I only have ONE profile in my account?  Just makes absolutely no sense... especially with a single profile. I like HBO GO’s interface better than MAX’s, but perhaps it will grow on me.

title: App and Controls are subpar
review: This app is much too clunky for such a well respected media service. The search bar should remember recent searches. The control screen when playing should have a navigation to additional episodes. The ‘continue watching’ section should allow you to navigate to series details. And the app continues to crash where I lose play/pause control when casting to a different device. I have to relaunch the app in order for it to ‘remember’ that it’s casting.

If those don't work, please reach out to us at hbom.ax/contact for additional support. Thank you, HBO Max Support", 'modified': '2022-03-02T04:49:22Z'}
title: Great catalogue, Incredibly difficult app
review:
I love HBO Max for the great selection of movies and shows. Unfortunately, across any device it is nearly impossible to watch anything through without issues. 

I’ve tried improving my wifi capabilities, ensuring nothing else is using the wifi, and restarting my phone/tablet, deleting and redownloading the app, and nothing changes. 

I hope that in time, HBO Max will have success in being able to provide uninterrupted watches so we can better enjoy the entertainment.

title: Buggy
review: Always kicks me out of whatever I’m watching, especially if I’m streaming it to my smart TV. My internet connection is always strong so I don’t understand. This entire week I haven’t been able to watch my shows because it’s restricting my account saying there is a parents block on it. Even though there is no pin or any kind of parental block? It’s even blocking children’s cartoons and everything on the app. I can’t watch a single thing… Everything is blocked. At this point I’d rather just cancel because there’s always something

developerResponse: {'id': 28414474, 'body': "Hi Earl, we're happy to help. We have some great troubleshooting steps here that should improve your experience: itsh.bo/troubleshoot-mobile. If those don't work, please reach out to us at hbom.ax/contact for additional support. Thank you, HBO Max Support", 'modified': '2022-05-19T03:47:39Z'}
title: Awful
review:
Fix the offline viewing issues. There is zero reason I should need a network to view shows I’ve downloaded. Oh, and if this absolute garbage dump of an app could quit randomly signing me out, or at the very least save my login information, that would be great too.

Update:  it’s actually gotten worse.  Now about every third or fourth download crashes the app.  Initiating downloads on the iPad crashes the app more than 50% of the time.  And I am not going to your troubleshooting section.  I pay a subscription fee, make an app that isn’t unusable.

title: Buffer buffer skip ahead CRASH!
review: No matter which show I’m watching, the app pauses (always at a crucial moment) for several seconds, then leaps ahead a minute or more, and it’s impossible to rewind - sometimes it just starts the episode over, or skips to the next one! Or it freezes completely and I have to restart it. When a person is trying to binge Gossip Girl to escape the woes of the Real World, this phenomenon is beyond annoying. I’m rapidly coming to the decision that the monthly subscription price just isn’t worth it.

title: Crashes often
review: Downloads often fail, sometimes the app will crash immediately when playing a download, sometimes the app won’t load at all when opening and sometimes it freezes after pressing pause on a download. I’ve tried updating, deleting and redownloading, trying various internet connections…nothing solves it. I’ve contacted support and got nowhere. The content is worth the money, yet the app functionality ruins the whole experience and I can’t access the content I’ve paid for. It’s aggravating and a waste.

developerResponse: {'id': 29481983, 'body': "Hi, we're happy to help. We have some troubleshooting steps here that should improve your experience: itsh.bo/troubleshoot-tv. If those don't work, please reach out to us at hbom.ax/contact for additional support. Thank you. HBO Max Support", 'modified': '2022-04-30T04:41:19Z'}
title: Why is this app so bad?
review:
It floors me that a company this big who knows how vital streaming is can have such a crappy app. The content is awesome. A high school computer class could have produced a better app.
 I don’t have to say what’s wrong. It is abundantly clear in the reviews. Now it’s even slower on the AppleTV than it was and it keeps going back to the login screen every time I can manage to click on a show to watch. If you lose customers, it’s because of the slow glitchy app. Pretty sure if it was important to you, it would have been fixed by now.

If you have any additional questions, please reach out to us at hbom.ax/contact so we can take a closer look with you.', 'modified': '2022-04-07T06:29:32Z'}
title: Cannot Download Content
review: Do not count on this app for entertainment while traveling. I’ve tried downloading movies ahead plane and train trips for a week’s vacation, and it did not work once. It would seem to begin downloading only to stop after about 2%. The app would often then crash. This occurred on many different WIFI connections. Many of my go-to’s are on HBO, which is why I subscribe. Do I really need to also rent these movies on Prime Video when traveling? IRRITATING. Although HBO, if you’re reading this, the least you could do is reimburse my fee for this month.

title: Horrible
review:
HBO Max is probably the worst streaming service I have used to date. I only got it because I need to finish watching the Righteous Gemstones. That’s all I used their service for. You’d think when I signed in it would take me to or at least mention as “continue watching” but no. I have to go search it up every time. 

HBO may be new on the streaming scene but dammit for a name that’s been around on the cable scene as long as they have been watching would have expected better than something better than North Korea public broadcast could probably put together.

developerResponse: {'id': 27595471, 'body': "Hi, thank you for taking the time to rate and review. We strive to provide the best experience possible and we always appreciate feedback. We'll make sure to pass this on to the rest of our team. To share feedback or feature requests please feel free to use our feedback form here: https://help.hbomax.com/feedback", 'modified': '2022-01-22T10:59:13Z'}
title: Very bad. Had to cancel within one month
review:
I signed up for hbo max thinking it would rival Netflix and am I wrong.

The content:
It is made mostly random bits and hbo stuff. If you watch by schedule, it seems a lot. If you stream and picky, then it runs dry super fast.

The app:
Basic app with continue watching and other stuff which everyone already have. The most important function of which worth 95 of 100 points is recommending shows. Hbo max apparently fails to understand that. They recommend their popular shows to me which I suspect they do with every single other user. Lazy. Who ever developed this logic understand nothing about user needs.
I think they laughed at Netflix million dollar prize for recommendation logic. Keep that up.

I will be back to Netflix and will never come back to this hbo max.

Not enough content and treat all users as one. Maybe one day your wish will come true.

title: I tried to give it a chance
review:
I saw a lot of negative reviews but I still chose to give it a shot because I really wanted to watch a show. Needless to say I ended up wasting my money because even though I was subscribed it told me I wasn’t, but when I kept applying for it, it said I already had a subscription to it. It wouldn’t let me watch any shows at all only just the pilot episodes so honestly it’s best just to stick to another streaming app because this one really isn’t it lol
*UPDATE* after I canceled the subscription they charged me for it again the very next day

title: Streaming even while device is off
review: This app has only recently been doing this odd thing where even after you turn off your tv, the phone app keeps on streaming to the tv endlessly while actually playing it no where since the tv is off. It didn’t used to do this and it’s not my tv since the others app from which I stream on my phone don’t do that. It has been quite chaotic. Please fix this

title: It’s ok
review: I mean the app works it hasn’t been too buggy with me but at the same time I really hate the people at the top who are being such d!cks to animation. Animation is a beautiful art from and takes a lot of time and effort to to learn how to do. I don’t think that these people who literally poured their souls into these shows deserve to be blown off. To all of the people behind C4rtoon N€tworks shows I commend you for how much of a fight you’re putting up for the sake of your shows I hope you will keep fighting for them

Thanks, HBO Max Support', 'modified': '2022-05-12T23:07:44Z'}
title: Great content, poor app
review:
The interface feels dated and it’s not built to surface more content you haven’t already seen. More time should be spent creating an interface that surfaces media based what someone might like.

Worst issue though: It’s just a buggy app. I tried to watch downloaded movies on flights. After pausing, the app eventually just becomes unresponsive and I have to kill it. Then, it won’t re-open until I’m able to connect to internet again. This is ridiculous.

title: Can’t sign in on different devices. Can’t download anything.
review:
I have been trying to sign in on one of my new TVs so I don’t have to view on my phone, but I get told with my own password that my login is invalid. The process to sign in is an extra step as sometimes I do have a difficult time going through the circles of signing in for it to not work. Also, I have been trying to download movies for a trip and when I hit download, it does nothing. 

I tried to download things that have expired in my downloads again and it always says it fails.

title: #1 worst streaming app
review: This would be the last streaming service on my list. Thinking about getting cable that way i get my moneys worth and i wont miss out on watching tv at inconvenient times. Whenever i use the app it is slow. Im usually in the car when im using it and thats when it is worst. Every time a commercial begins to start i get buffering for long periods of time. Im not paying to get commercials all the time that only stop me from watching what i want to much. Hbo needs to stop investing their money in ads and worry about the paying customers.

title: Worst streaming app I have ever used.
review: App freezes when watching downloaded content. If you are in an area without Wi-Fi (airplane etc.) the app will allow about 30 minutes of viewing and then freeze. Once this happens there is no way to solve the issue. Force quitting the app and restarting the device does not solve the issue. The app is rendered completely useless until you are able to reconnect to Wi-Fi. If you plan to download content to watch offline look elsewhere. So far this has been a recurring problem on several devices.

title: awful
review:
this is a terrible app.  i pay extra to have superfast internet and this app ALWAYS freezes, stops playing or  tells me i am not connected to the internet.
bring back the old app it worked .  This  app ALWAYS  kicks me off of my intyernet conne3ction. I always checki to make sure I am online before I try and use it,  halfway through a show it stops and says I am offline.  Also it does NOT connect to Apple TV.  Way overpriced for something that doesb't work.i make sure i am connected to wifi, i go on the site, it kicks me off my wifi

title: Unusable via AirPlay
review: This app has always been terrible but at least it would play as long as you didn’t try to scrub or mess with the controls. Now it won’t even do that. It randomly started stuttering and glitching while AirPlaying to my Samsung TV. The audio stutters and drops out every five seconds, making it a frustrating headache to watch anything. I’ve reset the modem and router, reset the controls on the TV, and reinstalled the app twice. No problems of this sort with any other app. HBO Max developers, you had a billion dollars and only one job. Simply unbelievable.

title: Broken App
review: I don’t know what you all did in the last update but the app refuses to download anything for offline viewing. Every time I click on download the app crashes. I’ve uninstalled and reinstalled the app several times and it hasn’t fixed it. It only seems to be happening on the iPad version of the app. My iPhone version works fine but I shouldn’t be forced to watch blockbuster movies offline on my small iPhone when I should be able to watch them on my large iPad.

developerResponse: {'id': 28888164, 'body': "Hi, thank you for taking the time to rate and review. We strive to provide the best experience possible and we always appreciate feedback. We'll make sure to pass this on to the rest of our team. To share feedback or feature requests please feel free to use our feedback form here: https://help.hbomax.com/feedback", 'modified': '2022-03-31T06:12:51Z'}
title: Nice but need SharePlay
review: I see lots of people have tons of different complaints but I’ve never experienced some of what I hear from others. Honestly enjoy the streaming platform but I’d absolutely love it if SharePlay actually worked. I tried several times but it won’t cooperate. Makes the experience less enjoyable since I’d love to watch movies with friends. Definitely makes me use the app a lot less than I used to because of this specific issue. Hope something gets done about it soon.

title: Ripoff, would not recommend buying subscription
review:
Hi. Since you’re here for a conclusion about the review i have said to the people who were thinking about buying the premium, well don't. HBO Max is far too bad for shows/movies but that’s not what I’m stating  here. HBO Max literally has a 10 dollars subscription with ads? Do you not see what I’m saying? Paying 10 dollars WITH ads. Literally what’s the point of even wasting 10 dollars, yes I know, 10 dollars isn’t even a lot but why with ads? That’s the most obnoxious thing I have ever seen in a movie app. 

It’s best if I keep a 1 star. Your welcome.

developerResponse: {'id': 28906163, 'body': 'Hi, thank you for taking the time to rate and review HBO Max. We are always working to improve our application, and appreciate any feedback. Please feel free to reach out to us here: https://help.hbomax.com/feedback to leave app feature requests. Thanks, HBO Max Support', 'modified': '2022-03-31T21:21:04Z'}
title: This should NOT be on macOS
review: I love the iPad/iPhone apps but the fact this is available on macOS is bad especially since it shows in 4:3 format with black bars on the right/left side of the screen on my Macbook. Even when I watch a movie I have bars on all four sides because of this 4:3 format of the app. Atleast make the app true 16:9 if you're going to make it available on macOS. It's great having an app on the Mac but one that works properly would be better.

title: Great app (pls read the review)
review: This is really a great app but for some reason when i open the app the screen turns fully black and it just stays like that and my phone has the new updated installed and for some reason ever since I’ve gotten the ios 16 update ive never been able to get into hbo max and watch a movie. If this is a bug pls fix it bc I really wanna watch something 🙏

title: Add a dislike/remove/block Shows/Films I Dislike
review: You know how you can add a film/show to your list?!?! It would be super helpful if the user could indicate that they are not interested in a show or movie being promoted. Promote everything by all means, but give me a way to say, I am not now nor will I ever be watching FBOY Island or x or y show. Thank you

If interested, fill out this form: help.hbomax.com/AppReview. Our team will reach out direct from there. HBO Max Support', 'modified': '2022-08-07T11:32:30Z'}
title: Great content, terrible app
review: If connection fades even slightly, the video will shut down. When you download anything, it won’t save your place if you pause and leave the app. When downloaded, you have to still put in airplane mode to watch or it will default to your data. Sometimes the moving dots that show it’s buffering just go on and on for minutes at a time in the middle of the screen while your video plays perfectly fine behind them. No other streaming app does any of these things

title: Just Terrible
review:
It’s terrible to have most of my favorite shows on this platform, just for the app quality to be this offensive.

Primary complaint is when trying to watch an episode, when I click play, the app immediately tells me I am offline and to check connection. I’m on home WiFi through high speed fiber connection. Second to that, when I’ve downloaded episodes to watch while traveling and no connection, the app won’t even load. Why have the option to download then can’t watch? Just terrible…

title: Reliably Problematic App
review: This app is very frustrating. I fly often and will download content to watch offline while I’m flying. This app always starts strong with great picture quality and content. Unfortunately, it always freezes at some point. I am left unable to pause, rewind, etc. and the only option is to close it. After that, it won’t begin working again until I am back on Wi-Fi. Needless to say I have to finish most of my viewing as a frustrated consumer another day.

title: Great movies, app not so great
review: The movie selection is amazing but whenever I download a movie I can’t watch it without internet connection which completely defeats the purpose of downloading a movie. I tested this with other apps like Netflix and prime where it worked perfectly, please resolve the bugs this is a great platform with a ton of content and I’d use it a lot more if they were fixed.

title: App is horrible
review: Great content, but the app is embarrassingly glitchy, online and offline. And not just on iPad and iPhone, it is subpar and painful experience on every platform.  On iPad, some episodes will not download, it crashes if downloading more than one show and if playing in offline mode is interrupted by anything, for example an alarm, it freezes and crashes. The GUI for online and offline viewing is far outdated and inferior to rivals like Netflix.  Hope new ownership can address this and fix. If not for the content, I would cancel subscription. Thanks

HBO Max Support", 'modified': '2022-02-26T02:31:09Z'}
title: Aweful bugs
review:
I am not the first one to say anything and apparently it’s been going on for a long time. I am in the middle of watching a series, don’t move, don’t close the app, don’t change connections, or anything. Then all of a sudden there is no connection or “HBO max is not available in your region” I live in south Florida and I was already watching the show. 
This is extremely frustrating. The selection is wonderful, but it’s garbage if I cannot watch the shows I paid to watch. Very disappointed.

developerResponse: {'id': 28010328, 'body': "Hi, we're happy to help. We have some great troubleshooting steps here that should improve your experience: itsh.bo/troubleshoot-mobile. If those don't work, please reach out to us at hbom.ax/contact for additional support. Thank you. HBO Max Support", 'modified': '2022-02-13T02:25:36Z'}
title: WHY IS THIS APP SO BAD?!??
review: For all of the money I’m spending on HBO the app should actually work! It is literally impossible to use the iPad app. When ending the app to watch a show that I’m in the middle of it skips to the end of the episode I’m on and then goes to the next episode which I’m not ready to watch. Not to mention when you click something it will respond to your touch 8 hours later. I never write reviews but I have to here! HBO should really be ashamed of themselves for allowing this app to be this bad. We’re all paying you a ton of money, hire some better app designers!

title: Great content, AWFUL app
review:
I was so happy to see HBO Max had a special price so I jumped on. However, on my TV, the video playback is choppy, the shows randomly stop & the app goes back to the Home Screen. 
It also buffers really often. 
The was AFTER I unplugged my TV & all to make sure it wasn’t that. 

On my phone, it’s not *as bad* (iPhone). But, it still can get choppy & stop playing the video. This is very annoying, esp being 2022 & the other apps I have run fine.

If those don't work, please reach out to us at hbom.ax/contact for additional support. Thank you. HBO Max Support", 'modified': '2022-01-25T05:44:28Z'}
title: Just needs some tweaking!
review: Overall, I love the content that is posted on this streaming service. I just wish it wasn’t had glitchy as it is. I would love it so much more if it didn’t randomly crash or stay loading for way to long. I know it isn’t just me because everyone I know who has it complains, plus the other reviews I’ve read also mention it. Please fix this and this could be a really amazing app!

title: I love HBO MAX
review: I’m at HBO max customer I have no problems with them at all. If your HBO max app cuts off is because of your Internet services. I have a booster router because I am a dead zone in the back of the tower. And it works well for me. I can continue watching my HBO and my other apps while I’m streaming. I cut the cable cord a long time ago. Happy that I’ve done it save money

Please reach out to us at hbom.ax/contact so we can take a closer look with you. Thanks. HBO Max Support', 'modified': '2022-08-05T17:12:56Z'}
title: Internet and offline issues
review: this has been going on since i downloaded my movies. I have been wanting to watch harry potter on the plane, but when I started watching it it cut off and said I was offline even tho I was watching the movie on the downloads. since then, it would say I am offline and i need to check my connection. dont get me wrong, I like the app but there are bugs that you need to fix.

If you have any additional questions, please reach out to us at hbom.ax/contact so we can take a closer look with you.', 'modified': '2022-08-27T12:18:35Z'}
title: Downloads aren’t reliable
review: I love this app for streaming, but almost every time I watch something I have downloaded, the video eventually stops with an error message that it can’t connect to the internet. The only reason I download in the first place is because I can’t get internet access all the time. Whenever it is working, I am afraid to pause or rewind because I don’t want to chance jinxing it  — what is the point of this feature if it doesn’t work consistently?

title: No Respect for Animation
review:
I had high hopes for this streaming service. The whole reason I got HBO Max was for Infinity Train. Seeing that they don’t care about or respect animation whatsoever made my opinion of this corporation drop.

They removed Infinity Train despite HBO Max being the only legal streaming service to watch this show. Then they complain about too many people pirating. Infinity Train was 100% on rotten tomatoes, yet they still wipe the show off everything! Many other shows have been given the same fate and it’s devastating. 

Don’t waste your money supporting this corporation.

title: Audio issue
review: Idk why during the last update I’ve been experiencing an issue where I can not unselect the “English-audio description” option on my iPhone when I’m watch a show. Could you guys just add a regular English option so I will not have to deal with this? I’ve even contacted support through email and I can not unselect this option on my screen

title: Can't update or redownload
review: I used hbo max fairly often until I got the notice for an update, which of course i tried to download. This failed and was left clicking the update button for nothing to happen. I then deleted the app and tried redownloading it by clicking the cloud icon. It registers that i click it and then resets and I'm left furiously clicking the button and haven't been able to download this app for about a month now. Hbo max has a great selection just not a good mac app.

developerResponse: {'id': 29993492, 'body': 'We’re hoping to learn more about the issue you’re having. If you’re open to having a conversation with us and a member of our development team, please contact us directly via this form https://help.hbomax.com/us/AppReview. Be sure to include your username Ant_Tefa where it asks for your Web Handle.', 'modified': '2022-05-27T00:22:21Z'}
title: Good content, buggy app
review: Great TV shows and movies, but I can’t watch them because the download feature is extremely buggy. I’ve had episodes get stuck, disappear, refuse to resume after being paused manually. I also had some downloaded episodes expire from my last trip, I renewed them but when I was on the plane they refused to play and gave me an error that I was offline. Also, the progress circle doesn’t move slowly, it jumps around. Very frustrating.

We want to make sure that using HBO Max is a great experience for you and an advocate would be happy to reach out to you directly to help. If interested, fill out this form: help.hbomax.com/AppReview and include your username - frenchbreadboi - where it asks for your Web Handle. - HBO Max Customer Support.', 'modified': '2022-05-08T20:24:08Z'}
title: Same as the rest of them… great catalogue, DOESN’T WORK!
review:
Just as many others said, I love their catalogue but their app has some awful bugs!

I’ve had this app for about two or three weeks now and never had an issue with it. In fact, I was just using it a few hours ago. Somehow, since then the app has begun telling me that it could not “verify my subscription” and won’t even let me access a login screen so I can try to resolve the issue! Why am I paying $15 a month if HBO’s just going to tell me they don’t think I’m paying $15 a month. -_-

title: We need a zero star option
review: This app has been around for YEARS. They have made NO improvements. This isn’t some dinky operation, it’s HBfreakingO. Get your act together already! WHAT is the point of allowing us to download content if we can’t watch said content without internet?! And, when people complain, they all  get the same automated, cookie cutter reply about contacting customer service…which accomplishes NOTHING. I’m not expecting a Netflix quality app here, but there is absolutely no excuse for a company this big and successful to put out an app this shamefully shoddy.

Thanks, HBO Max Support', 'modified': '2022-03-02T00:08:47Z'}
title: Great service Nightmare of a App from such a large company
review:
I love HBO but the app leads me to the point of almost throwing my phone every time I travel it doesn’t allow you to download anything and even if it says it’s downloaded when you want to access it it normally throws some error and takes it off your phone which is incredibly annoying. 
Works great on tv but phones are no good for using the downloaded content offline which is 90% of the reason why I downloaded the app!

title: Great app but…
review: I have enjoyed the app tremendously. However, accessing the app through my TV has been challenging. 1. The app blacks out after every episode so I have to click on each time, 2. app gets stuck if it is the last app I used and won’t refresh more frequently. 3. Sometimes connection is lost on the TV app while it works on my phone on the same Wi-Fi. Other than that love the shoes and picture quality.

title: Good service but useless when traveling
review: The HBO Max content is good, but the app is buggy and not useable when traveling. While the user can "download", the app needs internet to function (so just hangs when on a plane). And, while overseas, the app will give a "We're not in this region yet. You can only access downloads at this time." But, again, accessing downloads doesn't work. So, use the app while at home in the U.S., but choose another service for entertainment while traveling.

title: Honestly I only have good things to say
review:
I’d say to leave a review because there are a lot of great reviews for some reason. I’ve had no issues with HBO, on any front.I switched from Netflix because Netflix is- well, Netflix, and why the selection here isn’t as wide it makes up for it in quality.

It’s easy. I like it

developerResponse: {'id': 29871537, 'body': "Hi, we have some great troubleshooting steps here that should help with your app crashing: itsh.bo/troubleshoot-mobile. If those don't work, please reach out to us at hbom.ax/contact for additional support. Thank you! HBO Max Support", 'modified': '2022-05-22T03:20:57Z'}
title: Great TV shows! Too bad this app won’t play them.
review:
HBO arguably has the best programming of any streamer. Too bad their app is often so buggy it won’t play them. And when it does play them, the screen-in-screen won’t work, or it doesn’t save my place in shows, etc. I do not have these issues with any other streaming service I use.

EDIT: they messaged and told me maybe I should restart my phone 😂😂. 1) Of course this is the first thing I did. 2) they have hundreds of reviews complaining of their bug infested app and still think it’s user error? WOW

title: No stars. Useless. Thieves.
review:
This application just does not work. I managed to download about 40 minutes of programs, and it took me two weeks of trying. Nothing will play. Constantly crashes, refuses to download, and 3,000 “oops, something went wrong!” messages will have you stepping back from your device before you throw it out a window. 
Hbo did not refund me for the money I spent for one whole month of NOTHING, except constant frustration. No one will fix it. Save your money, your device, and your windows. Get your content somewhere else.

title: Glitchy, unreliable, doesn’t work
review:
This app is absolutely terrible. It works half the time. There are constant issues getting it to connect, frequent crashes and features that just do not work. For example, I downloaded some shows to watch on a flight and they would not work while in airplane mode. 

The app they had before launching hbo max was infinitely better. This app is so bad that it keeps me from watching shows that I enjoy because I don’t want to deal with how frustrating the app is. Has completely ruined hbo for me.

title: Great content - Terrible App
review: I like to binge watch some shows more than once - problem is the app does not allow it; once watched the app auto reverts to the end credits and you can’t rewind.  I swipe the bar to rewind multiple times and it does not work - sometimes it takes 15 or more tries to rewind or get the show to begin again.  It happens whenever I watch the closer, logging out does not solve the problem and neither does deleting and reloading the app.  Please get this fixed

If you have any additional questions, please reach out to us at hbom.ax/contact so we can take a closer look with you. Thank you. HBO Max Support', 'modified': '2022-01-29T01:46:43Z'}
title: Worst streaming app of them all
review:
This app barely functions. I am forced to fight with it almost every time I attempt to watch a show/movie. 

A feature that is almost totally broken is downloading for watching when you are off-line (airplane). You can download the show, but it will only play about 1 time in 5. The other 4 attempts result in a black screen, the downloaded content simply disappearing, or a message that says you need to be connected to the internet.

This app is REALLY bad.

title: I canceled because you value profit over people
review:
I was an early adopter of the HBO MAX app and even had a large chuck of my money invested in its parent company AT&T. 

But they have recently canceled, removed, and scrubbed historical shows, movies, and animations from their catalog with no other way to view them. All so they could stop paying the creators of those pieces of media residuals for their work. This includes publicly funded works like older sesime street episodes. 

As I am a conscientious invester. I have sold all of my stock. Canceled my subscription. And this I tell to the executives. GET BENT!

title: App won’t load for downloads when offline
review: I don’t currently have internet at home so while I’m at work I download a few hours of shows to my iPad to watch at night. Every night I come home, I open the app and it just loads infinitely. I force close it, I reboot the iPad, I update it and yet nothing. The only way I can ever get the app to load is to connect my iPad to my phones hotspot, load the app, then disconnect the hotspot and suddenly bam, there are my downloads. Why should I even bother downloading offline content if I can’t watch it offline?

Thank you! HBO Max Customer Support', 'modified': '2022-02-10T10:21:15Z'}
title: Atrocious downloads feature
review: The HBOMax content is phenomenal but downloading content is absolutely terrible. I expect a premium experience for the price and this app is not premium at all.  My current occupation requires me to travel all over the globe where an internet connection isn’t guaranteed.  Before multiple trips I tried downloading shows on the cell network, my blazing fast VIOS fiber optic connection, and regular hotel WiFi…all with the same result…no shows in my que that I can watch.  This needs to be fixed, otherwise I’m cancelling my subscription.

If you have any additional questions, please reach out to us at hbom.ax/contact so we can take a closer look with you.', 'modified': '2022-02-06T12:17:33Z'}
title: Great for streaming, horrible at downloads
review: HBO max is great if you want to stream something but if you try to download something for offline viewing the chances of it not working due to some bug are much greater than the chances of it working. Super frustrating when you are on a 7 hour road trip and can’t watch what you took the time and effort to download because of some bug which changes every road trip but inevitably won’t let you watch your movie.

title: Content is great, shows are horrible
review:
Sorry to write a bad review. I’ve been using the HBO app for about a year now and the app is poorly written. 

- Every time you exit and come back to the app the entire app reloads and doesn’t let you jump back into things. If you’re trying to pause a show quickly you have to wait for about 10 seconds for it to reload all over again. 

- I’m currently watching big little lies, great show, but it doesn't register at all in recently watched. So it’s hard for me to pick up where I left off. It does this with other episodes too. 

- not to compare it to other steaming apps but the user interface could be more seamless. It all feels too clunky and doesn’t transition well when trying to browse through your favorite show’s episodes or even something as simple as skipping to the next episode.

developerResponse: {'id': 31685802, 'body': "Hi, we're happy to help. We have some great troubleshooting steps here that should improve your experience: itsh.bo/troubleshoot-tv. You also may want to try restarting your network (modem and router) if you haven't yet. If those don't work, please reach out to us at hbom.ax/contact for additional support. HBO Max Support", 'modified': '2022-08-26T23:01:01Z'}
title: Great show selection, very glitchy
review: The show and movie selection is better than Netflix in my opinion, however it’s a very glitchy app. I will be watching a TV series and the app won’t let me load the next episode and says “something went wrong” but I can watch any other episode, just not the episode that’s next. When I watch on the TV, it cuts off the last 30 seconds of everything I watch.

title: buggy app, horrible company
review:
this app is insanely buggy and freaks out when you try to pause/play/fast forward/rewind. it’s constantly has to stop and buffer (not a wifi issue since other streaming services are fine). 

I also logged in to watch some shows and found out that they had removed them with less than 1 day notice. way to screw your customers out of the services they paid for. submitted a request for a refund — absolutely not worth the money for the subscription at all.

title: Awesome app. But the offline downloads keep messing up.
review: I live in an area where I rarely have WiFi or a way to the internet. And the offline downloads keep freezing up and not working after little use. Please fix downloads bugs or whatever the issue is

title: Great content bad app
review:
Love what hbo has to offer but the app compared to other streaming service apps is very glitchy.
The style of the app is very clean and easy to navigate but it’s functions don’t work well. 
The app shuts down and downloads are unreliable. I’ll go to watch them on a plane and they will come up as an error. Loading is often slow even with good service and streaming on other platforms without issue. 
Definitely some bugs that need fixing.

developerResponse: {'id': 30542123, 'body': 'Hi, thank you for taking the time to leave a review and share your thoughts. We would like to learn more about your experience. Please reach out to us at hbom.ax/contact so we can take a closer look with you. Thanks. HBO Max Support', 'modified': '2022-06-24T15:34:15Z'}
title: The bugs are killing it
review: I use primarily on an iPad mini 4 and everything is current both with the app and on my device. The app crashes more frequently than it functions. It crashes when I’m on wifi, it crashes when I’m trying to watch downloaded content in airplane mode. Literally every other streaming service seems to have this figured out. Like the other reviews say, the content is great…but what’s the point if we can’t watch it?

developerResponse: {'id': 30420844, 'body': 'Hi, thank you for taking the time to leave a review. title: App is awful
review: I have had HBO for a number of years now. This app is quite glitchy and awful on many counts:  can’t minimize the screen on all shows/movies to multitask, once I download a movie the movie gives an error message if I try to watch it over Wi-Fi, wont play downloadable movies without wifi at times. These are just to name a few. For $15 a month this app should be seamless. So disappointed. When I’ve contacted the company it’s not just “oh we know this is a problem. Can you send me 13 screenshots and the error message you get?”

title: Great movie app
review: The app has a small bug that needs to be fix, I’m currently using an IPhone X when I cast my movies, everything plays out fine it’s just the Audio description in the background while playing would be on even when I did not use that setting and would have to quit the app and load back up till it stops.

developerResponse: {'id': 27982157, 'body': "Hi Gary, we have some great troubleshooting steps here that should help with your app crashing: itsh.bo/troubleshoot-mobile. If those don't work, please reach out to us at hbom.ax/contact for additional support. Thank you, HBO Max Support", 'modified': '2022-02-11T05:54:36Z'}
title: Garbage app
review: Canceling this lame subscription. Crashes. Skips. Locks entire tv. If I was an actor.. comedian… whatever I would be up the rear end of the execs at HBO for pushing out such garbage. Fire your entire programming staff for this app and start over. This nonsense has been going on for to long now. Bye. //// 2/9/22 - LOL. no surprise here. Same garbage still going on. At my buddies house who pays for this stupid service. Took 6 min for a 30 min show to start. All he did was complain about this app the whole time. Good job HBO staff. Glad your no longer handling my hard earned money.

developerResponse: {'id': 27815021, 'body': 'Good news! You can now use the Pinch-to-Zoom gesture to make shows and movies fill the screen on your iOS device. Download the latest HBO Max update and let us know if you have any questions.', 'modified': '2022-02-05T00:47:41Z'}
title: Still No Fullscreen for downloaded movies
review: Appreciate you bringing back the fullscreen feature that you’re trying to make it sound like it’s new.   Also appreciate you also allowing users to watch downloaded movies while not connected to a network.  However, you still cannot do a fullscreen while watching downloaded movies while not connected to a network.  I hope it was just an oversight and will be fixed in the next release soon and not in another year.  Appreciate the effort though.

developerResponse: {'id': 27110140, 'body': 'Hi, thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We want to make sure that using HBO Max is a great experience for you and an advocate would be happy to reach out to you directly to help. If interested, fill out this form: help.hbomax.com/AppReview and include your username -\nAbrad1 - where it asks for your Web Handle. ^HBO Max Customer Support.', 'modified': '2022-01-01T02:51:46Z'}
title: Only So-so
review: We just got HBO Max though our AT&T plan a few weeks ago. There seems to be a lot of good content but the app itself is pretty bad. Movies will  just not load, if you stop watching a movie and go back to it later, it will be nearly impossible to get it to restart and then will start all over. Overall, the app is pretty useless. To summarize, if I had to pay for this service, I’d be very upset and want to cancel with a full refund. Since it’s included with our phone service, we’ll just hope it improves over time.

title: Too many pop-up ads
review:
Every time I use this app whenever I start watching something I get a pop-up ad suggesting a show I have no interest in and I have to click out of it. I don’t want or need ads. If I want to watch something, I can find it on my own. Especially when that show is already being shoved down our throats in 12 places as you’re trying to find something to watch.

How is this an editors pick with an average of a 3-star rating?! What a joke.

title: Good service, completely broken app
review: So I have HBOmax, works great on tv, computer, and game consoles, but the app? I can’t even get in. Tried to log in through the “provided through service“ option at least a dozen times over maybe 3 weeks, and not got in once. Occasionally gave me the option to choose the provider, but I never actually got to a login screen because it always stops on a spinning wheel of death. Fix your app please, HBO, so I can actually get to the content payed for anywhere else other than my house.

title: Only missing one thing
review: I am a big fan of HBO and the streaming it offers! My only complaint is the lack of access the app provides when offline. I can’t watch my downloaded content when I’m not connected to internet- wanted for traveling when internet isn’t accessible. Other than that, I really like using HBO for my entertainment!

title: Great Content, Garbage App
review: Always love HBO content but the app is almost unusable.  Constantly getting logged out. The pick up where you left off feature is rarely accurate and if it’s wrong there no quick way to get into the episodes of that show. Currently unable to login through my provider because it just pulls up the home page of xfinity within an internal browser. There are some other weird experiences I can’t think of right now. Definitely a one star app until some updates are made

title: Trouble logging in
review:
I try to log in into my phone but all I get is the loading Sign I delete the app an reinstall then I turn everything off on the app then turn it back on I look for updates doesn’t show 
I don’t know what’s the Problem I use on my PS4 an shows up So I have no idea

developerResponse: {'id': 29022742, 'body': 'We want to make sure downloads/using HBO Max offline work great for you. See this article for some common tips and tricks: http://itsh.bo/max-downloads. If you have any additional questions, please reach out to us at hbom.ax/contact so we can take a closer look with you.', 'modified': '2022-04-07T05:18:20Z'}
title: App needs massive improvement
review:
App keeps crashing whenever you have more than 2 ongoing downloads, plus you can’t adjust streaming quality and go with default that if you’re on data plan, takes around 7GB per hour!
Secondly, what is the purpose having downloading options if you’re unable to view content offline? Yes, you’re reading correct, it asks every time to get online first and connect to a WiFi in order to watch it. HBO content itself is great and worthwhile but app needs a LOT of improvement!

title: good app
review: I just downloaded HBO max and so far I like it but there is one thing I would change about the app. Instead of making the program freeze whenever someone watching on the app tries to go into another app could there be a smaller screen? Like picture in picture?

developerResponse: {'id': 27995465, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review! We're sorry to hear your experience hasn’t been the best. We have some great tips and tricks here that should improve your experience: itsh.bo/troubleshoot-mobile or http://itsh.bo/troubleshoot-tv. If those don't work, please reach out to us at hbom.ax/contact for additional support. Best, HBO Max Customer Support", 'modified': '2022-02-11T17:17:11Z'}
title: Clunky, Buggy, and packed with content
review: I’ve seen less bugs in a truck stop motel room and experienced less clunkiness in a Pontiac Fiero. For those of us who travel a lot, the download function is crucial. But with this app you’ll be lucky to view 10% of your downloaded content. App itself is absolutely packed with great content, and they seem to get more every month. I honestly expected way more from a company that’s put out some of the best tv in the past 20 years. Rare miss for HBO.

developerResponse: {'id': 27934493, 'body': 'Hi, we want to get you signed in and streaming as quickly as possible, An advocate would also be happy to reach out to you directly to help. If interested, fill out this form: help.hbomax.com/AppReview and include your username - Smackro - where it asks for your Web Handle. Thank you! HBO Max Support', 'modified': '2022-02-09T04:40:06Z'}
title: Fails to deliver cross-platform service
review: I’ve been a customer for years but in trying to activate my membership on another platform, I continuously failed due to error after error, from inability to use the tv sign in to inability to change my password via the app or the website (so I could log in by email). This led me to cancel my membership. There’s other programming out there I suppose. Would’ve rated 1 star if not for the great catalog. Maybe you’ll have better luck.

developerResponse: {'id': 26678824, 'body': "Hello! We'd like to look into why it isn't loading content for you. Please reach out to us here: help.hbomax.com/appreview. Thank you!", 'modified': '2022-01-01T14:55:47Z'}
title: Cannot watch anything?!
review:
I loved the app, watching shows and movies that I wasn’t able to watch prior to this, and commercial free! However after this latest update I cannot watch anything. Nothing will stream. It just keeps trying to load, and the dots flash back and forth, no matter how long I try to wait, nothing happens. Kind of a useless app now considering it doesn’t do what it was designed to do…. Still waiting!

So it started working again, up until today. Now I’m back in the forever loading screen….

developerResponse: {'id': 31261650, 'body': "Hi, we're happy to help. We have some great troubleshooting steps here that should improve your experience: itsh.bo/troubleshoot-mobile or http://itsh.bo/troubleshoot-tv. If those don't work, please reach out to us at hbom.ax/contact for additional support. Best, HBO Max Support", 'modified': '2022-08-03T16:56:32Z'}
title: Issues
review:
Content great! 
However, it takes 30 seconds to load- every time I open. It times out on pause, i get kicked out and I have to open again but it doesn’t open- I just get the hbo max screen so I have to go to firestick settings and clear cache, then open another app- watch something else, exit that then try to open THIS app again. Rinse repeat three times! It’s ridiculous!!!

title: Bring back the cartoon catalog!
review: After the discovery+/Warner media merger, in an attempt to save face with investors and recoup some money by claiming losses on their taxes, HBO Max has dropped several completely finished animated series and scrapped even more coming down the line screwing the creators out of royalties and screwing fans out of accessing the content. The man in charge of doing this has the misguided boomer/gen x ideology that cartoons are just for kids and then has the brilliant idea to scrap 200+ episodes of Sesame Street, the progenitor of childrens educational programming. The fans demand you cut the crap!

title: Subscription
review: I tried to cancel my subscription through my phone and it will not let me. I go through Apple services so I tried to see if they could help me cancel but they could not. But for some reason when I go to my account and try to end my subscription through HBO it says I’m being billed through Apple so I’m lost. Other then that HBO max is great.

HBO Max Support', 'modified': '2022-08-09T22:03:32Z'}
title: I think you fixed the wrong bug
review: The apps working fine, then suddenly while trying to watch a program across the screen in huge type that covers the entire picture is the name of the show which episode and of course HBOMAX. So what’s wrong with that?  Nothing if you aren’t interested in actually watching the show or pausing it or having any other control over it whatsoever. If this bug isn’t fixed I will drop HBO because I refuse to pay for something that is more irritating than entertaining.

developerResponse: {'id': 30537130, 'body': 'Hi, thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We want to make sure that using HBO Max is a great experience for you and an advocate would be happy to talk to you directly to help. If interested, please reach out to us at hbom.ax/contact for additional support. HBO Max Support', 'modified': '2022-06-24T10:57:34Z'}
title: Always kicks me out saying I’m offline
review: This is the most annoying streaming service app I’ve used. I really like the selection and was to watch things from this app but I constantly get kicked out of my shows, saying I’m ‘offline’. When I have cell service and internet connection and everything else works for me on my phone. It’ll kick me out multiple times in one show, I never have this problem with any other streaming service app I use.

title: Buggy, non-fuunctional
review: Have downloaded, attempted to use, deleted, downloaded again, and it will just not comply. It is slow, frequently crashes, and downloading anything for offline viewing is nigh (if not completely) impossible. I don’t have these issues with my Netflix or Criterion iPad apps…only HBO. Streaming is okay, until it crashes or buffers endlessly. For an app that AT&T ultimately owns & contains pretty much the greatest smorgasbord of content, simple efficiency remains mysteriously elusive. Please fix.

If none of these steps work for you, please contact us here hbom.ax/contact and our team will be glad to look into this further with you. Thanks for being a part of HBO Max! HBO Max Support", 'modified': '2022-06-18T21:06:16Z'}
title: App is a failure if it won’t play random ep’s
review:
This app is absolute garbage. The most inconsistent & unreliable app I have downloaded. 

Streaming a show, random seasons will have random episodes that APPEAR downloaded, But are not & when you try to stream them over wifi, the app says you’re not connected to the internet, so it’s a lose-lose for that episode. 

Imagine watching GOT & having to skip an entire episode because HBO app won’t play it… what’s the point in the app if you cabt use this feature? Too much $$$ for this level of failure

If those don't work, please reach out to us at hbom.ax/contact for additional support. Thank you! HBO Max Customer Support", 'modified': '2022-03-05T07:20:12Z'}
title: Loading issue
review: The app never wants to load and when it does it takes forever, had it for awhile now and haven’t been able to use the app due to it, and I know it’s not an internet issue because everything but this app runs fine, so I’m not sure what the issue maybe, I thought maybe it was because my storage space was running out so I deleted things for it to be able to run but it didn’t work, so I’m not sure what to do now

developerResponse: {'id': 29298365, 'body': "Hi, we're happy to help. We have some great troubleshooting steps here that should improve your experience: itsh.bo/troubleshoot-mobile. If those don't work, please reach out to us at hbom.ax/contact for additional support. Thanks, HBO Max Support", 'modified': '2022-04-21T04:50:48Z'}
title: Can’t watch anything
review: All of the comments about the app being buggy as extremely accurate. I rarely have a problem pulling it up on my tv but the phone app is another story. Every now and then, the “play” option just goes away. No explanation or way to fix it.  Sometimes it will give me a notification saying to be turn on my cellular data but every time I check it, it is already on. I mainly watched HBO on my phone but it’s not even worth it if you can’t even use it half of the time.

If you're using a TV or connected TV device, please try these steps: itsh.bo/troubleshoot-tv. If those don't work, please reach out to us at hbom.ax/contact for additional support. Thank you. HBO Max Support", 'modified': '2022-02-26T06:05:47Z'}
title: Streaming issue
review: This is my second day since buying HBO max and now I cannot steam anything on it. It pops a message saying “we are having trouble communicating with the service” but my internet is fine and all of my other streaming apps are working fine. Hopefully they will fix this or down the price! I only pay $5 a month for paramount+, have had it for almost a year and have never had an issue except for when my internet is down!

title: Worst streaming app out there
review: I’ve given it a lot of chances but this app doesn’t skip backward, skip forward, load, or play correctly. It only connects to my chrome cast on some devices, sometimes, and other times not at all. It doesn’t hold the place you were last watching, it restarts constantly, it’s slow to load, it’s not user friendly. I think whoever got paid to make this app was an excellent prankster. Just find HBO shows elsewhere, it’s actually quite easy (easier than using their app for sure).

developerResponse: {'id': 27194263, 'body': "Hi, thanks for the review! It's really important to us that you have a positive experience while using HBO Max. We'd like to learn more about what is happening and see what we can do to help. If interested, fill out this form: help.hbomax.com/AppReview and include your username, LVD2, where it asks for your Web Handle. Thank you, HBO Max Support", 'modified': '2022-01-03T06:00:06Z'}
title: More like HBO *Minimum*
review: The catalogue is there for you with interesting content once every six-or-so months (unless you like one sided “documentaries” this is the streaming source for you). If you’re an audio impaired soul like myself, you might be lucky enough that the subtitles might catch up before your show or movie ends, if not you’ll have to restart the app and pray it might sync. This app is a buggy nightmare. From iPhone to PS4/5 and even the web browser, I would never in my right mind recommend this app. Our money needs to go further.

title: Doesn’t work on airplanes
review: This is a consistent issue I’ve had. I download stuff to watch on a plane then when I’m in the air the app won’t load. Not sure why that is. I’ve tried airplane mode no wifi and airplane mode with wifi and no dice. I think the app thinks because I have no service it can’t play anything but then why even have a download feature? Other than that it works fine for me.

title: So What's The Future Of The HBO Brand?
review: I have enjoyed HBO and HBOMAX for years. Dependable, imaginative, innovating top quality tv shows for decades. I have little use for Discovery + (new HBO owner) and it's reality based bargain basement programming. The plan to combine both services, that have nothing in common, is like combining a circus and a ballet on the same stage. And if you think this App is bad ... wait until that happens. I can only hope the value of the name HBO, around the globe, will influence the people now in charge to continue supporting the vision of those who worked to make that name famous.

title: Buggy Mess with Good Content
review:
This app is a mess. It is consistently the worst experience out of the other streaming platforms. Including bugs like audio not syncing, the most annoying bug is when it quits playing a downloaded video when my internet is spotty even though it doesn’t require internet to play downloaded material.

Other than the app itself, the content is good quality. Just a terrible way to view through their app.

developerResponse: {'id': 30629820, 'body': 'We’re hoping to learn more about the issue you’re having. If you’re open to having a conversation with us and a member of our development team, please contact us directly via this form https://help.hbomax.com/us/AppReview. Be sure to include your username mria80 where it asks for your Web Handle.', 'modified': '2022-06-29T22:24:57Z'}
title: Great selection escecially the dc hub but….
review: I have a fire tv and it is so slow to load and react throughout the app. Sometimes it doesn’t even load at all, just freezes. Also the rewind and forward is the worse of all my other streaming apps. Please fix . Other than that I do love but have been choosing other apps because I am a remote addict and when I get into a movie or show , I hate to miss anything. Ty

title: Best Content. App Negatives
review: Amazing content, hands down some of the best mainstream, quality, content. I’ve used HBO more than Netflix now, I believe HBO is now in a position to be a major competitor to Netflix and other streaming services. The app issues are messy, and the user interface can be, weird to say the least, however the content, web client, and TV client work considerably well.

title: Why do I pay for a subscription if I see ads still?
review:
This is messed up, do you watch ads on Netflix? No because you pay money for the service. Do you watch ads on Disney plus? No because you pay money for the service. 
Why am I paying for ads right now?

title: Broken
review: I can not even begin to express how clunky and broken this app is. I attempted to download episodes of a show so that I could watch when I did not have internet access, first the app would not open at all without an internet connection. What is the point of being able to download if I will need internet to even get in? Then when I was back where I had internet the app opens up but then tells me I’m offline when I most certainly am online. Completely useless, waste of my time!!!

developerResponse: {'id': 30590306, 'body': "Hi there, it\x92s really important to us that you have a positive experience with HBO Max so I'd like us to dig into what happened and find a solution. title: Glitchy and very slow
review:
Navigating this app is an exasperating test of patience.  Every click of the Apple TV remote takes 3 to 6 seconds to respond.  On top of that, many functions simply don’t work at all.  Like the “skip” function for getting past ads and intros (I pay for the ad free option, btw, but they still advertise their shows with previews).  The skip function, if it even registers, will end up with the screen frozen.  
I do not recommend their app if they can’t build one that functions adequately.

title: super buggy
review: Honestly I enjoy HBO max as a streaming platform. It has a great variety of tv shows and movies. But what I don’t like is that the ios app is super buggy and takes up a lot of storage as well. Whenever I’m watching a movie or browsing the app seems to run into an error and kicks me out. Honestly it’s such a shame that this has been a problem for over a year now and hasn’t been fixed.

title: The worst streaming app
review: I keep deleting this app and coming back only bc of Friends, but omg this app is the worst designed streaming app. Half of the episodes I can’t even watch bc it just glitches and won’t play it and keeps giving errors. It stops working in random moments and you just have to give up on watching whatever you started bc there’s no fixing it.. Having so many streaming apps out there without these issues, you’d think they would release a working app since they’re charging for it.

title: Horrible App
review: I have never had so much trouble with an app before.  In particular,  errors when downloading.  I ride a train to and from work and I download a lot to shows and movies to watch.  I cringe every time I try to download something from HBO Max because I never know if it’s going to work.  How could a company so large put out such a bad product?  And I also have the app for the Fire Stick and that one is terrible also.  It’s time to change developers.  I love your content, I just wish I could get to it.

developerResponse: {'id': 28750813, 'body': 'Hi, thank you for taking the time to rate and review HBO Max. We are always working to improve our application, and appreciate any feedback. Please feel free to reach out to us here: https://help.hbomax.com/feedback to leave app feature requests. Thanks, HBO Max Support', 'modified': '2022-03-24T03:13:22Z'}
title: Just one complaint so far…
review: I like the movie and show selection. Haven’t had any problems with the app. I can see what others mean about the app being a bit sluggish and slow but it’s not on my radar. The only real complaint I have is the app always opens with some kind of pop up window that I think could just be integrated into the scrolling area. If I wasn’t paying for the service then I wouldn’t have an issue with it, but I do.

title: Profiles!
review:
I would like HBO Max to use the Apple Developer “Mapping Apple TV Users to App Profile” feature (Current User privilege in the User Management Entitlement capability.)

I hate having to select “Who is watching?” all the time when Apple has given developers the ability to see who is using the Apple TV via Apple TV Profiles.

developerResponse: {'id': 27245937, 'body': "Hi Jean, thanks for the review! It's really important to us that you have a positive experience while using HBO Max. We'd like to learn more about what is happening and see what we can do to help. If interested, fill out this form: help.hbomax.com/AppReview and include your username, jean371, where it asks for your Web Handle. Thank you, HBO Max Support", 'modified': '2022-01-05T05:59:02Z'}
title: Worked for one day only
review: I purchased a subscription and downloaded this app yesterday. It worked for all of one day and then I kept getting an error message telling me they couldn’t play the title and to try again later or check my Internet connection. Every other app I have works fine with my Internet. I tried deleting the app and reinstalling it. I tried turning on and off the iPad. I tried clearing my history and making space. Nothing worked. Also there’s no refunds for people in the Caribbean.

title: Buggy But Good
review: There is not a great selection of movies and shows but it is enough. Also it is super buggy. I will be completely connected to internet and it will say I am not connected. If they get a bigger selection and fix the bug it would be a great app. I do have to say though, it is better than some of the other streaming apps I’ve seen. Other than all that, it is a good app.

title: broken :(
review: The app has always been buggy and very slow, and for the past few months when using with chromecast the app freezes every time I lock my screen, meaning I have to close and restart the app, then connect to chromecast every time I want to pause. Since the most recent update, the app freezes with seemingly every interaction, and when I manage to cast something, the audio doesn’t come through. My other apps work fine in this regard - this is an HBO Max app issue. FYI, I have an iphone 11.

title: Shows Don’t Pick Up Where I Last Viewed
review: Recently I have to start every show over again and fight my way through trying to find where I last stopped viewing. My stopping point is never saved. This has been a problem for a month or two, and it did not previously happen. I have logged out/logged in, deleted and reinstalled, rebooted my phone — each of these multiple times.  Any suggestions?

title: Good but…
review: PLEASE incorporate telecast or watch parties on your streaming service. I want to watch things on HBO with my friends but we can’t because it’s unavailable, so we always end up going to different platforms in which we CAN do watch parties. I don’t see why we shouldn’t be able to, I mean we’re both paying the subscription fee, this isn’t a difficult feature to add. HBO (and a couple other platforms) that haven’t adopted this feature are REALLY falling behind.

title: Now that you updated the Apple TV app, how bout for iOS?
review:
Echoing many the statements of many users, this app seems to be crashing every time I attempt to download just one 22-minute episode of a series. I’m traveling soon and would love to have downloaded content on my device. 

Now that Warner Bros. Discovery is officially merged, you really should start thinking about how to fix this long problematic app, especially if the endgame is putting all of HBO Max and Discovery + content in one place. Otherwise, just kill this app and start fresh! :(

title: Terrible app for great content
review: This is the buggiest piece of software. Here’s what it’s done… 1. Won’t start 2. Stops playing the audio 3. Switches language from English to Spanish all on its own 4. Switches from closed captioning to an audible description of the show 5. Stops playing in the middle of show even though none of the other streaming services stop I really HATE this app and hope a better way of streaming HBO Max shows comes available. Come on, I don’t have these issues with any of my five other streaming services.

title: Redesign!
review: They fixed the interface. I’m probably way to excited about this. UI design is one of my favorite things and this app was rough for a while. But they just pushed an update to the Apple TV app and I’m so excited to see it come to iPhone and iPad later. We’ll done designers and coders. The Apple TV app is perfect

title: Lots of glitches and issues with iPad
review: I really enjoy HBO content and I try to download content prior to flying.  However, more often than not the HBO Max app will just display the three dots and never load the content.  I close the app and restart it over and over, shutdown and restart the iPad repeatedly and sometimes the issue resolves, sometimes it doesn’t.  Please hire someone from Netflix who has a STABLE and RELIABLE app.  This is bad enough that I’m considering cancelling HBO’s service.  Great shows that you can’t watch are rather pointless.....

title: Always says I’m offline
review: Really wish you guys would fix the bug that claims I’m offline when all my other apps work perfectly fine. I try to play a show and it loads up all the options but when I click play I’m offline how can that be if it loaded the app and the home page? Deleted and redownloaded several times and the issue is still persistent. Please fix!!!!
