title: “Can’t play title. We’re having trouble playing this video”
review:
So many bugs but this one takes the cake. This happens way too often when trying to play a downloaded title. Only solution is to delete the download , restart the app and play from WiFi or cellular. 
I have my iOS up to date, abundance of storage and my app is up to date. 
There’s also a big lag when trying to delete a downloaded title. From the time you press the X until it disappears takes 6-7 seconds. 
Good luck If you need to delete multiple titles, as the app will crash and restart. 
Why can’t I just swipe left or right to delete ? Why does every title needs to be put in delete mode ?
There are so many other issues but these happen on a daily basis.

title: Great content, buggy app
review: I love HBO, but the app can take several minutes to load. I’ve had to reinstall it a couple times. And you should be able to view downloaded content on a smart phone without having to be connected to the internet. Seems you have to be connected to get the app to open.

title: Can’t even watch on Roku Tv
review: I bought a subscription and the app on my Roku tv won’t let me sign in. All it says is create an account and that they found my subscription in Roku pay. Absolutely ridiculous shouldn’t be this hard. Have tried everything I just ended up cancelling my subscription and wasting 15 bucks. Have heard this is a problem many people are having. Get it together HBO

title: Ep selection
review: when ever i watch a show and i want to go to a different episode on the show it doesn’t have the “More episodes” option. I would then have to look up the show and look at the episode i wish to watch. Hopefully they change this. Other than that the overall app is really good.

title: Broken PiP
review: Whatever was done on 26 September broke Picture in Picture. This is aside from the dreadful general performance and absurd sorting of downloaded episodes. I have to wonder if any of the developers use any streaming apps themselves. Downloaded episodes aren’t organized by show, but in the order of when the download finished. This makes playback a nightmare if you’ve downloaded multiple episodes of multiple shows.

title: Excellent Content, Substandard Delivery
review: Similar to many other reviews, the quality of the content is unimpeachable. The app intended to provide the content, unfortunately, often functions at the point of being useless. One would expect that by now, HBO would appropriately plan and adjust for heavy demand increases when new and popular shows release new episodes. This simply does not seem to have been the case, and one wonders if the criticisms and concerns will ever resonate.

If those troubleshooting steps don't work, please reach us at hbom.ax/contact for additional support. HBO Max Support", 'modified': '2022-08-20T04:36:04Z'}
title: Frustrating
review: This app has great content and that is where the good ends. I’ve never experienced this much frustration using an app. Constant crashes, extremely long download times when you get the rare chance of it actually allowing you to start a download, Home Screen won’t load 50% of the time. These problems have been there since release and somehow are getting worse after each update.

title: Can’t login with provider
review: App began to freeze on both my iPhone and iPad so I deleted and reinstalled. Now I can’t login with my provider account. I’ve tried reinstalling the app, and deleting the TV provider from my settings as both were suggested, but I can’t get any further than the spinning dots when you select the sign-in with provider link. It’s unacceptable that this hasn’t been fixed yet. This is only a review about the app, not the content.

title: Downloaded content requires WiFi or data??
review:
Why does my downloaded content require WiFi or data? That is defeating the purpose of “downloaded content”. Anytime I download for a flight, the app hardly ever opens once I’m in airplane mode, just spins and loads. And on the rare chance it opens, it says Can’t Play Title. 
Best streaming service, but horrible horrible app.

title: Awful
review: The app wouldn’t even open today. Just sits there with the three dots. Also, I download shows to watch when I don’t have internet and it says they have like a month to watch them. Then I go back in a few days later and says they expired. This has happened multiple times. If I didn’t get HBO included in my AT&T, I would definitely cancel. Plus, there aren’t that many good things to watch. I miss my Netflix free I had with T-Mobile :(

title: An Anime Problem
review: Yesterday I was watching Hunter X Hunter in english dubbed, but when I woke up this morning I was starting the next episode and it’s no longer in english dubbed. It’s back to the original version in witch I can’t stand!! Seriously how are you going to have something in english one day and the next day it be in Japanese without any way of notifying your customers?? So I suggest you fix this problem REALLY SOON!!

review: This app is almost useless. I need to download to my iPad for traveling and flying. Downloads take forever. Can’t run multiple downloads. I find I have to delete and reinstall the app when I get internet access again and have to download again. FIX IT…

title: Fix Your Apps
review:
Have this free with my phone plan. Shows and movies are best if the best. It’s just a shame that you can’t watch them because their app constantly chugs on any device I watch on. Netflix and Disney don’t lag, but you do constantly. Can’t get into anything new with your product. 

P.S.- My latest attempt was watching Winning Time: The Rise of the Lakers. Looks awesome, but tonight was my 3rd attempt and your app has chugged and frozen EVERY time. Not even one episode in.

HBO needs to poach some people from other streaming services to learn how to build a proper app! They should be ashamed and embarrassed of this joke of an app.

review:

I downloaded two movies on Netflix yesterday, and started one download on HBO tight before those two. Netflix was done and HBO maybe was 10% done. 
Stuff either doesn’t download or doesn’t playback while offline. I give up. It’s really frustrating.

title: Content is great, app is awful
review: We love the content, but this app, especially on the iPad, is buggy. It takes two minutes to load an episode and then skips to the next episode and starts loading again. Sometimes skips an a second time, all while buffering for two minutes at a time. Other streaming apps on this iPad and this network are fine, fine, and fine. Please make the app as good as the content!

title: App is literal Garbage
review: I’ve never encountered an app that is this buggy across the board. It’s buggy on a TV, buggy on a laptop/browser, and it’s buggy on my phone. I fear trying it on a gaming console, there’s not enough Hope left to do that. The only thing it is consistent in is it is consistently buggy. I have never written a review for anything like this, so hopefully this shows how terrible it had to be for me to say something! Get your stuff together here people.

title: Unable to have watch party within app or through third party
review: Watching tv has always been a social activity. It would be great to watch a show with your friend without jumping through hoops. Even though the content is great, the app has to work or the content is useless. I understand that the difficulty sharing has something to do with hdcp but I feel like two years into a pandemic and virtual life should make this an issue worth solving.

If you’re going to charge so much the least you could do is make sure it works for your customers. This has gone on for months so it’s not like it’s a new issue

title: Why HBO max
review: Every time I go into there I get kicked out or it takes about 30 minutes to load when something I wanted to watch was only 20 minutes it resets all your continue watching at some point to zero when I would’ve been at 55 minutes it’s a good thing but still why so many bugs

title: Everyone is going to revert to piracy after this. Please read.
review: I am infuriated with this and I want you to rethink. I still watch those shows and go to social media. They kind of don’t like what you’re doing with those animations so please don’t delete them, or like they say, the only way else to watch these shows will be to pirate them. I don’t want that, and you don’t want that either, so please change your mind and read this

title: Functionally Worst App of all Time
review: HBO Max’s selection is pretty decent, but the functionality of this app is the epitome of disastrous. I could write a book on all the problems with this app and how it literally cannot manage to perform a single task or operation without failing in some way. With no exaggeration, this is EASILY, the worst functioning app I have ever used in my entire life. If HBO Max had every single movie and show on Earth it would still not be worth subscribing. That’s how bad the app is.

title: Great content, horrible platform
review: Idk what’s been going on lately, but I haven’t been able to watch anything on HBO max without it glitching, lagging, or straight up not playing the video. It has nothing to do with my own internet connect because everything else I use works fine with or without wifi. This is getting ridiculous, I can spend my money elsewhere if this is the service I’m going to get. Your catalogue is not worth the headache

It either crashes, gives me errors, or tells me my account isn’t authorized to watch downloaded content. Very disappointing for an app I pay a monthly subscription for.

title: Simply awful interface.
review: HBO has the best lineup, bar none. However, this app is among the worst apps I’ve used. Downloads create crashes and rarely finish on the first try, let alone the fifth. App crashes every few moments. When I am offline it limits my access to my downloads. I was hoping the newest update would fix these issues and, in fact, they have exacerbated every one. There is no reason for an app to be like this in 2022.

title: Slow, buggy app
review: This app takes way too long to load when we do not have a good cell internet or WiFi. Why do we need data access to view downloads? App seams to get worse, the more we use it. Why does iPhone storage show the app using 6gb when we do not have any movies downloaded? Why does iPhone storage show downloads when we delete them from the app? Apparently the app does not free up iPhone storage when a download is deleted.

Tried turning off my tv and turning it back on. Same problem. None of the other streaming services have issues like this. I’ll be canceling if they can’t make their app actually function.

review: The download function doesn’t work properly. I had movies downloaded for a trip and sometimes the movies just wouldn’t download. Once I had them all downloaded the app randomly deleted both of the movies I had downloaded for my flight. Please fix this app. The catalog is so good but the bugs kind of ruin the things the service does well.

title: Worst streaming app out of all the main services
review: For a page streaming service, this app is really pretty terrible. It crashes all the time, finding programming and new episodes of things that I watch weekly is cumbersome process. And downloaded content often only works up until you need it (suddenly stops working soon as you were in the air without access to the Internet). Repeatedly crashes

Going to cancel as soon as the new game of thrones has aired all the episodes.  However, even that show (which is great so far) is not fun to watch because it is constantly stopping and having to be restarted.  Save your money and don’t bother with this one.

title: Randomly blocked profile
review: Woke up one morning and my profile was blocked from playing or downloading ANY videos from either our kids’ or adult profiles. Can’t fix it from the Manage Profiles menu, and it looks like a lot of iOS users are complaining about this same issue. It’s been over a week without a fix which is pretty sad on HBO’s part. I can’t even imagine this happening for ANY OTHER STREAMING SERVICE for a DAY let alone ten days.

title: Terrible offline experience
review:
Using this app while offline during travel is a headache. Downloads get deleted, progress inside shows and movies get reset. They could do so much better to provide a great offline experience (Like the other streaming apps). Additionally, downloading movies and managing downloaded content while offline is very clunky. 

The only reason I return is for their content, but the app experience gets 1 star from me.

title: Amazing catalog and shameful app
review:
Seriously the team in charge of this app should be ashamed. The level of bugs is pathetic. When you said in your last update that you fixed a ton of bugs, you forgot to add that there are more tons to fix. 
 
And what is outrageous is the passion, work, and devotion to their job of all the artists who give to HBO such a fantastic catalog of film and series and how a team of lazy people in charge of its apps makes them so difficult to watch.

review:
Overall good stuff to watch. But the app is not good. It’s buggy, has performance issues, and downloaded content straight up doesn’t work. Not sure why and not sure why it wants to phone home to work right offline.

Downloaded multiple movies and shows to my phone for offline watching on a plane ride. Ended up unable to watch. Google says it’s been a problem for two years.

title: Too expensive and too controlling
review: They take movies down and put them back when they want you to see them while charging you a monthly fee while there is nothing you’re interested in watching. Took a survey and they never got back with me. Won’t be subscribing to HBO ever again as I have no reason to. I can get every bit of their content from somewhere else. I’m tired of the streaming services taking advantage and price gouging.

title: Great Content; Terrible app
review: Both the Apple and FireStick apps are buggy. The Apple app in particular crashes frequently, even after updates to improve the app. It crashes especially when trying to download content for offline viewing, or when fast forwarding. Also, don’t try to fast forward for very long or the play button stops working and you’ll end up way farther ahead than you meant to be.

title: HBO - best cable network ever
review:
I have experience none of the buggy issues others complain about (I’ve had the app through 2 or 3 iPhones now - currently iPhone 13 mini).  And - it’s HBO!!!  Best content, best original material, best cable network ever. 

Nuff said.

title: No offline watching
review: I downloaded several episodes of a show to watch on an airplane. After doing so it said, ends in 29 days, which I take to mean you need to re-sync to keep watching. After boarding the plane, turning airplane mode on, I started watching. After 10min it says "you're not online." Well no duh, I'm on a jet plane. The ability to download and then watch later is non-existent.  The app is only good if you have wifi or a cellular connection.

It’s always a triangle with a corner on this app. Again, content, whatever but just noodle around on the menu and try to not have a mental prolapse. Hoping for better!
<3

Please don’t add another feature until the app can present a video all the way through without freezing.

title: AppleTV app is awful
review:
The iPhone app is great but the one for AppleTV is awful. It’s so difficult to get subtitles for foreign movies turned on, the navigation is weird

Also for the iPhone app I wish I could turn off the pop ups suggesting programs I’d like.

I can’t figure out their algorithms but I have yet to get a suggestion anywhere near my viewing habits.

title: Too many canceled shows.
userName: I just want to buy a bed.
review: Another streaming service that has little to offer in ways of entertainment. The few original shows actually interesting enough to watch are canceled without closure. Dealing with the endless torture of boring crap just to find a few truly exciting and interesting gems, only to discover they’ve ended prematurely is beyond disappointing.

title: Horrible streaming app!
review: This is the worst streaming app out of all that I have subscribed to! I am on the verge of cancelling bc when I stream on the tv it buffers and gives me error about my Wi-Fi but no other service has this issue! Then I have to steam from my phone to my tv and that doesn’t want to work at times either and I have to try the tv again! It’s getting ridiculous! It’s not my Wi-Fi or devices bc all other streaming services work!

Good movie and tv selection, love that I can download stuff to watch later. However, if something expires and I click renew? It does nothing. Having to remove the download and redo it gets pretty old. 
Other than that, really glad to be able to watch Our Flag Means Death and The Batman. Hope to see Our Flag Means Death renewed!

title: It was working great across devices, then…
review:
I just paid for the yearly subscription a few days ago, and everything was working fine, but it booted me out of the app on my AppleTV, and has stopped recognizing my info. 

I’ve restarted, and deleted then reinstalled the app. Still no good. The phone app still works fine. What gives?

title: Great catalogue, but needs improvement
review: For one, fix the Chromecast part so it works. Also, drop the price to $7.99. You don’t need to charge such steep prices just to keep your app running. Also, with the steep price, I would think your catalogue would be much bigger. Fix up!

title: i love hbo, hate the app
review: ok so, there is absolutely no problem with streaming whatsoever but the app is incredibly buggy, crashes when downloading, slow when looking for stuff to watch, and now a new bug is it dosent let me watch my downloads!! the app was way buggier before but now i cant even access my downloads 90% of the time, before it was revamped i could watch shows with 1 bar of service and a little patience and now i cant even access my downloads with no service!! whats the point of downloading for school to then be told i need to have internet to watch my downloads 😐

title: Hit and Miss
review:
The hassle of it not working with my Apple TV every time we turn it on, outweighs the content unfortunately. It’s hit and miss as to what shows work and what doesn’t - then I’m stuck watching on my iPad by myself. Not very fun. 

Sounds like this app has been buggy for quite some time. Surely you make a ton of money so why not hire the right person to fix it?? Asking for a friend…

title: Bad app for iPad
review: I have an Apple TV 4K and the app works great there but I cannot get it to work consistently on my iPad. It won’t load and then it will skip to the end of an episode and go on to the next one and not load then skip to the end of that one. Super frustrating since I like to use my iPad just as much as my tv.

title: Terrible app
review: This app works flawless on Apple TV and I use it all the time, yet iPad version is one of the worst. Constantly crashes, freezes while trying to download videos to watch offline on the plane (the only time I actually use iPad), after numerous attempts I might manage to download it only to find it unplayable while already on the plane... seriously, Netflix has it figured out and works perfectly, why can’t you?

title: ABSURB APP
review: For the amount of money that this corporation makes, this APP is a hunk of junk! It is the most unintuitive and frustrating I have used, and there are MANY out there, it almost makes me want to cancel my subscription. Even when a show is downloaded on your device, sometimes it just doesn’t play. Doesn’t want to. It’s not in the mood. Hire some better coders!

title: Can’t use Picture in Picture
review: I have everything set correctly and the correct version and plan and cannot use PIP. Very frustrating as I can with everything else I stream on.

title: App has been good so far… but
review: So far I’ve had a decent time using the app whether on a phone, tv, or iPad. However, I’m still questioning why SharePlay is not a feature yet. I would love to be able to stream a movie with people over FaceTime. Other than that it’s been good

title: Doesn't even let me sign in waste of time
review: I try to sign in and it constantly tells me to sign in with the tv provider I use I put in the information it closes the tab I try to watch something and it still takes me to make a subscription for HBO MAX. I try over and over an it still doesnt let me watch anything big waste of time. Don't download this app on IOS unless you want to sit for 30mins trying to get this to work.

title: The app behaves as if it’s mad at you for using it.
review: It takes forever to even open. Titles often refuse to play with a good connection. Menu screens often won’t load at all and you have to keep opening and closing the app until they do. Downloading titles doesn’t help either as they won’t play if you have a poor connection despot already downloading the content. More frustrating to use than it’s worth.

title: Last update needs another patch
review: I love this app but just got a update and now can’t play movies or watch any of my favorite shows. How can I explain so HBO knows what I mean? I click on title of my show I want to watch or movie and I’m put in a infinite loop of clicking. Ugh just want to show my stories HBO.

review: This is THE worst app compared to other video streaming services. Cant play a single movie bc the play symbol might just decide to be missing. Your captions? I am no novice or some tech illiterate. This is bullocks. I pay for this.

review:
There is a lot of bad here as far as how it works. 
But one of the worst is that I have 10 hour episodes downloaded, but HBO is taking up 49 gigs of space!!!!
The old episodes are staying in memory after being deleted, HBO eventually will eat all my iPads memory cause their programmers can’t do basic things like actually free storage after it’s deleted. Not worth paying for.

review:

What should be a simple “if offline, then go to downloads page” becomes watching the HBO loading page for 10+ minutes and praying I can access a movie while I’m flying.

Good content but please resolve this.

review:
Most of the time I enter the app, it gives me the same message: Hello!There is an error. Please restart the HBO Max app. Like what? EVERYTHING ELSE ON MY DEVICE WORKS,TOO. And this isn’t just a one time thing to. I have to keep clicking out of the app until it stops giving me the message, otherwise I can’t watch anything. Please fix this. Thanks.

It’s happened so much I’m changing my rating. Would be no stars but you can’t do that so one

review: I have no issues with the Kindle version of the app, but the iPad OS version is awful.  The app crashes (e.g., when you press download button) and, more often than not, I get a download error unless I am on higher speed service, download one item at a time, cross my fingers and toes just right.  I’ve tried deleting and reinstalling the app, but doesn’t help.

title: Casting to TV Makes Me Insane
review: The language/audio description has a life of its own when casting to my TV from my iPhone and I can’t figure it out. Sometimes, all it takes is toggling between to get back to English. Other times, there’s no fixing it and my only option would be to watch in Spanish or with audio description. HBO is the king of content but this app is embarrassing.

title: Terrible Interface
review:
The interface is bad. Shows can’t keep place between platforms and between watches. It take three (!) or more movements to get to an episode list on a particular - bad design. There’s no favorites or hot list for repeated viewings. Next episode button is inconsistent; skip intro or recap is inconsistent. Sometimes it works. Sometimes it isn’t there at all.

Just a bad, bad product. Everything above is very standard in modern streaming. Get with it.

Embarrassing that an app even exists in the App Store that runs that awfully, much less from a company with the amount of resources this should have.

review: I downloaded based on the selection of titles and as there were two series I wanted to watch, in particular. However, I’ve been disappointed with the experience. The app is slow, clunky and reboots itself often. It also takes forever to download content - IF content downloads at all. I don’t experience these issues with other apps like Netflix, Prime Video or Apple TV.

title: Picture in Picture no longer working
review: I really want/need to use the Picture in Picture feature when using this app.  However, it stopped working on me a couple days ago.  I deleted the app, and it worked again just one time immediately after, but then stopped working again right after that. ☹️

title: To me it’s great
review:
I love being able to watch hbo off my phone and Roku , I also love that when you click on the movie you want too watch it tells the time.
ALSO it has ALL the movies I die and live to watch so I love it !!!

title: Buggy
review: Long time user. Literally since it came out. It's great for content. Not great for viewing. It constantly freezes. Like, all the time. It's so frustrating honestly. You'll be into something and then all a sudden... Can't load. You'll be half way through something and it cuts out. If they'd fix their app. It would be great, but it really isn't user friendly.

Also if a put the timer on my tv and Im using hbo max, the next day the app doesn’t work, at all is like is freeze, I have to restart my firestick so I can use it. And is the only app that does that.

title: Please do better
review: I get that you’re not FANG with unlimited resources for updates, but you’re barely hanging in there. Im giving 2 stars instead of 1 purely because of content, but if you don’t make some upgrades soon, no one will care what content you have.

title: Forcing shows or movies
review: I’m disappointed that when I’m watching shows I’m being forced to watch an ad (that I’m paying not to have) for a movie. I also don’t like how my app “bugs out” and auto plays featured movies even though I clicked another movie that was nowhere near the featured one. I can see the changes and it looks like it may be time to drop you guys.

title: Crappy sound
review:
The content is good and worth the price. The way they manage the sounds is horrible. You either can’t hear a word and need to turn the volume up and then they sound get crazy loud for some screens. This gives headaches and making watching anything on HBO a nightmare.

I have a surround sound system and have no issues on any other platforms

title: Enable offline playback!!
review: Worst video streaming app. HBO has tons of great content but this app is an absolute piece of trash. You can not play downloaded videos without an internet connection. WHHHHHHHHHHYYYYY.  WHY EVEN BOTHER OFFERING DOWNLOADS as a feature in the app. Want to watch your downloads on a plane? Nope! Want to watch your downloads while traveling abroad? Nope! Add this feature PLEASE! This app also crashes constantly. Genuinely considering unsubscribing from this service because the app is so bad.

I’ve been able to watch exactly 1.5 shows with this app. It freezes, won’t load, and skips to the next episode.  Then when the next episode won’t load, it’s skips to yet the next episode and I’m caught in a never ending loop.

Apparently if I want to use the subscription service that I pay for every month I have to go sit in front of my TV like it’s 1955.

title: Great catalogue but buggy video player
review: Whenever I watch a show on the HBOMAX app it starts to freeze every couple of seconds and I checked everything online that I could find and nothing fixed the freezing issue.

title: HARRY POTTER DELETED!!!!!! 😡😡😡😡😡🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬
review:
I always watched hbo max just for the Harry Potter and now it is gone i HATE hbo max so unless you bring back all eight Harry Potter films then i will never watch on HBO max ever again. And for the potter heads that read this review i am sorry that the dumb makers that made this dumb app deleted the amazing loved and famous 8-film series harry potter because i am crying right now.
So unless harry potter ever EVER comes back i wil NEVER NEVER NEVER watch HBO max again so i hope your happy 😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡

title: Buggy
review: This app is so buggy. I have to keep deleting and reinstalling it cause it’ll just freeze on a black screen. Can’t back out or do anything. I also hate that you have to be connected to wifi. Sometimes my cellular data runs much smoother than wifi so I’d like to have the option to switch back and forth if needed.

title: Stop refreshing the list every time I switch apps
review: I just got HBOMax and am trying to scroll through all the movies to build up my watch list. The listing of a-z movies is huge. I get 1/2 way through it and have to switch apps, or respond to a text and then when I come back to the app it decides to switch to the home screen and refresh. I lose my place. Please have your human factors / usability team look at this.

title: Excellent acoustics
review: Very easy to navigate, moving at lightening speed. Easy to remove items from “Continue Watching” row. Searches do not require full name, nor title, nor perfect spelling. Sound quality on my iPhone excellent.

title: MUCH BETTER NOW THAN EVER!!!!
review:
The new update is amazing!!! Picture in Picture works smoothly & the app on my iPhone is much better than before. 

Content wise, HBO MAX is the GOAT. So much to watch & enjoy for all audiences. A bit pricey, but well worth it. Check it out!!’n

title: Seems to not like WiFi
review: It says it is disconnected quite a bit. I can’t hardly watch anything for the error message. I’ve tried installing app again, logging out and logging back in, and of course closing app and reopening. But it still doesn’t want to actually play content on a consistent basis.

title: Subscription issues
review: DO NOT GET HBO MAX IF YOU EVER PLAN ON CANCELLING IT!  I’ve literally been trying to cancel for two months now and they refuse to let me. I’ve verified all my information with them multiple times. They want me to go thru a third party to cancel and I’ve tried doing that but only running into problems! They are having me run in circles!!! I am having to just go up to my bank and block the charge because they refuse to help me! I WILL NEVER HAVE THIS AGAIN OR ROKU FOR THAT MATTER!

title: Glitchy
review: This is single handedly the glitchiest streaming app I have ever used. I plugged my phone into a projector and it simply doesn't hold up. It continues to glitch out and then stop working. I can only watch about 5 mins of any show until this happens. It is so annoying. I really hope it gets fixed because some of my all time favorite shows are on here but as of right now I have very little hope for this app.

title: Good content, poor implementation
review: I like the content HBO provides but the app is slow and the captions are SO buggy across all shows. Extremely frustrating to miss entire pieces of dialogue because the captions don’t load. I am not hard of hearing but like to watch on a pretty low volume, this is completely unacceptable for those that are hard of hearing though.

title: App is buggy in airplane mode
review: I travel frequently and like to download movies on my iPad for the plane. The HBO max app is basically useless in airplane mode. I can usually get something to begin playing but once I pause the playback or an episode finished, it is impossible to get the playback to resume. Force quitting the app doesn’t help at this point bc it just freezes at the opening logo screen. Useless when not connected to internet.

title: Make latest episode sort to too
review: This seems to vary based on which program im looking at.  I wish the most recent episode was always one tap away for all the shows, for some reason my saved show always likes to show an old episode I keep accidentally starting to realize its old.   Hate the layout of the app, great content though

title: HBO MAX Is Elite
review: HBO MAX is the elite entertainment app with Prime Video a close second.  My apologies to Netflix, Epix, and Paramount because I am unable to compare your apps to HBO MAX and Prime Video because I have never subscribed to your apps—nor am I compelled to.  The HBO MAX and Prime Video apps are all I need for premium content.

title: Premium shows is this program’s hallmark
review: For the past 50 years, this program has the best of any kind of show, series, documentary and movies. It is the stand-alone elite, then there’s everyone else.

title: Downloaded Content Rarely Plays
review: I’ve downloaded multiple movies to play while traveling. They won’t play and say to check internet connection despite the fact that they shouldn’t need it. Now, even when I’m on Wi-Fi they won’t play or show info and say there is no internet connection even though I can play movies that aren’t downloaded.

title: Works alright
review: The downloads say it will be there for 30 days but never is so you always have to check before u leave to make sure your download is still there but that’s my only complaint

title: Bugs
review: I love this app but , on the tv every time I watch friends it skips through the whole show so can you please fix it? It works perfectly fine on my phone. — alivianicole.

title: I love this app but ....
review: Hi. I wanted to say this app is super duper great but if you could add these movies it would be great here are the movies icarly , Sam and cat , and last but not least victorious! You did a super good job creating this app tho that’s why I give it 5 star review please respond!

title: Compatibility issues
review: I have a 13 pro and have no problem watching Netflix and listening with my Samsung Buds Plus. However, HBO max my Buds will not work. Also I can’t connect my 13 pro to my Bluetooth audio in my truck and again the other 4 streaming platforms work just fine. Please fix!

title: Bad App, Amazing Service
review: The app is buggy and slow, doesn’t run well even on newer hardware, and is really difficult to navigate. In particular, the Downloads feature is really, really hard to use and barely works at all, pausing and restarting downloads with absolutely no rhyme or reason. Shame, since I like to download and rewatch Game of Thrones episodes for plane travel.

title: Somehow good and bad at the same time
review:
Let me first begging by saying that the app has an excellent catalog of movies and shows.

To enter settings I have to wait several seconds as if the app was trying to check if in fact I am online to go there.

Loading anything overall takes very long.

Downloads are extremely slow, I have 500Mbps internet and I know for a fact my network is not the problem.

Downloads are very buggy, sometimes they do initiate and sometimes they just refuse to download.

I have encountered most of the crashes are when I try to download something.

I really hope the app improves. 

TLDR: Bad performance, good catalog.

title: Great service, horrible app
review: I’d love to know how despite having unlimited data, and the fact literally any other streaming service will load in less than a second considering my near perfect reception, but HBO refuses to connect to cellular data, despite the toggle being set to allow doing so. Awesome when i paid for a service to watch a few select shows, yet still cant because I dont have wifi. Unbelievable.

title: Doesn’t Work
review: This app just doesn’t work. Constantly says no internet connection on my phone but only when I try to watch something, trailers work perfectly. Tried in my Apple TV. Nothing at all happens when you click on the play button. HBO max is great if you just want to watch trailers. On my smart TV this app shuts my TV off the moment it loads up. I hope you’re not paying for this, I get my useless account free thru AT&T.

title: Great shows, garbage app
review: Seriously this is so frustrating. The app will crash on my tv’s and my phone. It’ll keep playing and sometimes say it can’t connect. It will keep loading the Home Screen until it times out. Seriously you guys are a huge corporation, get it together and get a better bandwidth or fire your tech person and hire someone better. Goodbye.

title: The worst
review: Out of all streaming services this is by far the worst. It’s so buggy you literally can’t get through a movie. I’ve used the website version and even though their selection is pretty good, it’s so frustrating that it’s safe to say I won’t ever subscribe and I don’t recommend it. The worst bug I’ve experienced is that you can’t ever rewind - the whole site stops working every time and you have to exit out.

title: Terrible
review: This app is one of the worst I’ve ever downloaded on my phone. Right after I got a HBO Max subscription I downloaded this app and the first time I opened it it was already telling me how I didn’t have an account. It never even gave me a chance to sign in. I deleted and downloaded it back multiple times. No luck. On top of that the app is really glitchy. Do not recommend wasting your money on something that won’t work.

title: Just why
review: Why? Why is this app so useless? Why have an option to sign in with a provider if it never works. It is way more expensive than it should be, it doesn’t have the content, streaming quality, or playback setting that would make this worth that money. The only reason I used this app was because I got it free with Cricket. Now that it refuses to work, the app gets deleted and you get a bad review.

title: Best choices. Worst aspect ratio.
review: I scoured the internet trying to find out how to get the HBO max app to play in full screen. I have an iPhone 11 which utilizes the entire screen in every video app except HBO. It is terrible when a movie like Fast 9 is filmed in the same aspect ratio of my phone, but I have to watch it with black bars on all four sides of the screen. This needs to be fixed ASAP!

title: So so
review: Love HBO MAX but this iPhone app including the tv app on my Samsung is always glitching and runs really slow compared to all the other streaming sites/apps. Sometimes it won't open because I'm "offline" although I'm always connected to WiFi which works on all my devices. Would be a great app minus those issue.

title: I’m no longer subscribing
review: This has been my staple streaming app since it launched. I had it day 1 and told everyone I could about how fire it was. It’s just kept getting better content and more additions. HBO has 40% of my collective streaming time for the last 2 years. But with this new discovery deal the are cutting a lot of content I frequented. And I can’t tell who their audience is but it’s not me anymore. I’m sad to see it go it WAS the best.

title: Warner brothers is stupid
review: First they cancel the batgirl film which is already filmed then they won’t do the Godzilla vs Kong sequel (at least that wasn’t filmed before cancelling it ) I have zero reason to subscribe to a service that doesn’t have stuff I’ll watch , won’t even waste my time with black Adam and Shazam. Ty Warner brothers for making my streaming choices eaiser I’ll also see if I can get others to cancel as well Disney plus thanks you

Shockingly bad.

Please have someone on the team use the app for a week and make some changes.

review:

I’ve tried weeks after weeks with different movies and shows and it doesn’t matter. Don’t pay for this until they fix it.

title: “Can’t play”
review: Every day this app sends me playback errors. When you do get a video to play it usually runs smoothly for the rest of the session. However, it’s hit-or-miss if you can actually get a video you want to watch to play. This has been an issue since the app came out and, unfortunately, has not been fixed with updates.

title: Read this but I’ll still keep the app because
review: It has my favorite movies and shows it’s the best but downloads barely work I don’t even know what does it mean when under some movies it says HBO I guess it keeps it forever or something else

title: Great content, lackluster app
review: HBO content is second to none. The app, however, is very often non-functional, particularly when used offline with downloads. When used in offline mode the app will completely freeze once you stop or adjust playback, and will not function at all until you’ve used it online again.

title: Small screen issues
review: Love the app. Don’t have any glitch issues it runs fine BUT I tend to keep choosing other streaming apps because I can’t use picture to picture. Please fix this already. Been an on going problem for over a year. Works one day and then doesn’t.

review: Why have a download button if it doesn’t work. It seems I was overly lucky with the app working pretty well on my iPhone. But man, I’m paying for it now with how it barely works on my iPad. No downloads, super slow to load anything, and just lagging it seems. You’d think a big time company like TW would want to put out a quality app, but I guess not.

review: I subscribe via my cable provider (Cox) but every time I try to login via my provider option I constantly get an error message that I can’t because they’re having technical difficulties. At first I thought it might have been because I wasn’t logged into my primary account, or it was my VPN, etc.  Nope, nothing. Why have the option if it won’t work. Totally useless app.

title: A phone problem
review: Ok I love this app but sometimes when I pressed this app it tell me to verify it or try again and it takes a day or two for to get in but it fine on my tv please fix this problem and I would like to option to put a lock on my own profile

title: One little favor
review: So it’s really grate and yeah but… can you plz plz pleeeeeeez ad hilda I thing that how you spell it it’s been so long can you plz add all seasons too? Plz plz . P.s. plz put it on Xbox versions too and she has blue hair with a British accent. And home all of them plz.

title: Have we lost perspective?
review: I mean really people… it’s 15$ a month and you have a choice of so much stuff to watch its mind- boggling and your giving 1-star reviews because your internet’s slow? I think some Americans have forgotten what REAL problems are.

title: Always crashes for days before a premiere
review: What else would you expect from HBO?  Of COURSE it would crash for DAYS (and not even admit it has problems, but say there is a poor user connection) when it is finally offering you the programming on which it sold you.  All of my apps work fine.  My connection is fine.  I have uninstalled and reinstalled.  HBO should issue partial refunds.  End of story.

title: Playback struggles
review: The content is great, but what use is great content when half of your episodes don’t play? I keep getting error messages on certain episodes of the show I’m watching, meaning I have to skip that episode and move onto the next one. Very frustrating. This has been happening through every app update as well.

title: Crud
review:
Ok first off good selection but I can’t use the app. I have looked everywhere to find solutions to my problem and there straight up is none. Parental controls. Totally broken. 

I have an adult account there are none set on my account in the app, this being said i looked at that and guides told me to check device parental controls. There are no parental controls on my device either. This is dumb hbo. Please fix it

title: Downloads
review: Trying to download episodes is difficult, it says it is almost downloaded but will restart repeatedly. It’s crashed a few times, I’ve tried with different wifi, turned my phone off and on, deleted the app and restarted. Nothing works.

title: HBO’s app is terrible
review: On both mobile devices and on smart TVs, HBO’s app stinks. PLEASE allow users to turn on closed captions without having to exit the content you’re watching. Also it’s so buggy and loading time is really slow. I just tried turning CCs off 4 times - I exited what I was watching, turned them off, and then they turned back on. So annoying.

title: Good Catalog, Bad App
review:
- Apple TV App integration is broken. Clicking on a current show/movie just brings you to the HBO Max app home page rather than resuming or starting the media correctly
- App is riddled with notifications and pop-ups to promote other HBO Max content. This is exasperated by randomly popping up 20 sec into starting a show. Remove these. You already have the pre-show section to advertise other HBO content or the Home Screen. This actively hurts UX.

title: Lots of Issues
review: About half the time the reckons I have no internet connection, just taking me straight to the downloads page and saying I am offline. Also when it does work and I try to download offline it crashes, some times the downloaded content just refuses to play even though it says it downloaded fine.

review: I don’t use this service as much as others so I don’t know how much content it really offers compared to others. I would be much more satisfied though if it weren’t so spotty and buggy. Sometimes it stops a show mid-stream and takes me back to the home page. I really think HBO max would have a higher review average if it weren’t so spotty.

title: Getting Better
review:
The selection has gotten much larger and more impressive. HBO has become my go-to streaming app.

However - be prepared for constant frustration. The app is forever freezing and crashing. It doesn’t matter if you’re using it on mobile or on a smart tv. If you somehow manage to get something downloaded it helps, but good luck with that.

review: Let’s be real the content selection is bar none phenomenal. However, since release this app is just terrible. Chromecast literally does not work on any tv I’ve tried. Can’t believe this app has been out for a couple years and still no fix. Don’t waste your time with this app on your phone, either use it on a console platform, or a tv app. Just stay away from this app for chrome casting, it’s horrendous.

title: Pay Your Developers to Create a Better App
review:
This is HBO and we all know how good shows are on HBO. But this app is beyond wonky. Slow loading, slow buffering, ramped de-syncs, and above all else the app religiously messes up on airplane mode not allowing you to view downloaded content. Which is one of the main reasons to download and use the app

So again, HBO should  get better developers and actually put funding towards an app that works the way it’s intended.

And yes I have the latest software and operating system. Your app is hot baked garbage.

So I changed my settings, and I still cannot use the service. iOS app for iPad is bad.

review: Thank god for Euphoria. There’s lot of good shows and movies, and the content is the best available. However, without Euphoria, the app itself is way too buggy and glitchy to pay even $1 a month. In fact, if things don’t improve soon, I’ll be canceling my subscription, Euphoria be damned. With every update, things only seem to get worse. I know I’m not alone.

title: Terrible Subtitles/Captioning
review: I rely heavily on subtitles and captioning to be able to enjoy TV series. Before purchasing a monthly subscription, I made sure subtitles were available. They are… but they are terrible and I miss out on the majority of what’s being said. So far, I’ve only been able to understand about 50% of what is being said due to subtitles being unsynchronized, skipping, or just not showing up at all. I’m very dissatisfied.

title: No PIP - 1 STAR
review: Every video app in the world has picture-in-picture support, except for HBO Max. Really…I know. I just paid for one year, in full, and am so irritated it doesn’t have this feature. Responding to text messages is now so annoying because I have to pause my show or movie, respond to the text, sometimes multiple, even further delaying my show, and then readjust and get back into what I’m watching. Come on, HBO. PIP Now.

title: Download Feature is Useless
review: I recently went on a trip and downloaded some movies to watch on the plane. Once we got in the air and there was no signal, I opened the app so I could watch one if the movies I had downloaded. I was greeted with a message that said I needed to connect to the internet for the app to even function. What’s the point of even having a download feature if I can’t watch it offline?

title: Downloads will not play offline
review: Discovered on a 12 hour flight that the content I downloaded is not accessible when offline/airplane mode. App won’t even open. Saw on Reddit this has been an issue for a while and it’s still not fixed? Do better, listen to your paying customers and actively respond by fixing.

title: DO NOT BUY
review:
If you subscribe via the app, it won’t let you watch on any other device. It will let you watch on your tablet/phone but the account will demand a second subscription to watch on your TV. Customer service is worthless and will claim they have nothing to do with it and to contact Apple and that they have no proof of an account even with screenshots. 

This isn’t an Apple problem. Apple works.

title: Error message alert…..
review: I’ve tried to reinstall the HBOMax application on several occasions, but it claims my email and password are incorrect. I’ve no complaints about the app it’s, as the interaction is top notch. Just wish I could get the app to work on my iPhone.

title: iPad app controls
review: Hello. I was just wondering if I write here about the lack of controls on the iPad app that they could be added. You know, like the space bar pausing the program or the arrow keys skipping forward or backward. Those controls are really handy. Thanks for content. Bye.

review:
Two stars only for content and occasional acceptable performance
On good wifi. Perhaps the worst streaming app for downloads. I have most streaming apps and travel often . HBO max constantly loses downloaded content. Performance is quirky and inconsistent. Really disappointing as content and choices are great….when you get to actually watch them.

FUX THIS YOU ARE THE WURAT STREAMING APP OUT THERE!!!

title: The app itself is a PAIN to use！！！！
review:
I am so glad that I am paying 15+ dollars per month to use this buggy mess!!! Downloading speed is super slow and often when the content finished downloading it won’t open (showing “you are offline”). Such a waste of time.

If you are here for the amazing catalog, it’s still good. But the app itself could seriously use a lot more polishing! Just learn from Disney+ and Netflix please!

title: Infinite Login Loop… still, it’s been over a year
review: It’s been over a year with the same problem. select ATT as the provider, sign in… everything appears to work. Then select the show you want to watch and the HBO app requires you to sign in again… and again… and again, with no possibility to watch any shows. Same problem, same feedback over a long period of time with no solution/fix.

title: Only works well on Wifi
review: Whenever I get on a plane and watch downloads, as soon as I use any controls to skip forwards or backwards the app stops working properly.  After which it crashes and won't restart.  Now that I'm abroad for a week, it won't log back in.  So I'm unable to watch the shows I do loaded for the trip.  Very frustrating.

title: Laggy, clumsy, too many steps
review: How can this app be so bad? Every time I travel I attempt to download some content, but it never works. No matter how strong the WiFi signal is. I also hate how hard it is to switch between continue watching and trying to find other episodes. HBO has been around forever, this should be the premium app.

title: HBO Max is better than Netflix
review: I enjoy it a lot and it has a lot more content than Netflix does but I struggle navigating through TV shows if I wanna go back to a previous episode just wish the menu was a little bit easier to utilize

title: Terrible “Profile” switching and Parental controls
review: Come on HBOMax, do a better job on parental controls.   Have you seen how Netflix does it???  Why do you have me put in a PIN to switch to the Kid profile??   Seems you should ask for a pin to go to the “adult” profile.  Or better yet, allow anyone in any profile and then just ask for a pin when the rating on the movie is “R” or worse (so to speak).   Boy this is stupid.

title: The App Is Horrible
review: I pay for HBO to be able to stream and watch the shows I like wherever I go. This app is literally the worst app I’ve ever used. It does not function, constantly crashes, doesn’t load, and it can’t even properly download videos. Half the time I can’t even get the app to open. HBO, what are you doing?! I have the most up to date iPhone and iOS system. It’s no one’s fault but your own. Do better.

title: It’s perfect, but there is one small issue
review: So when I am not using any apps, HBO Max looks darker than normal, it only happens when it’s inside a folder. It looks as if it is updating but without the circle. When I open the folder it turns normal. Please fix.

title: Movies not playing
review: I love the app but some of the movies will not play. I get a pop up stating that this title will not play and that we’re having issues playing this title. How can that be resolved for the iPhone?

title: It freeze my entire computer
review: I bought MacBook M1 Max the most powerful one. Yet when I open this app in my browser, it says I should close the page as it's using too much of my power. It wouldn't be a problem if it wouldn't freeze my entire computer to the point I would have to restart. Also wouldn't be a problme if I was paid to use this, but i'm the one paying and this is unusable.

title: PiP
review: Everything is almost perfect with this app, except the Picture in Picture does not work! Worked for a while, and never came back. At this point it’s almost impossible to want to keep the app simply because I have to stop a show to use my phone. Please fix!

title: App
review: I love the content on here, but I hate that the app crashes on the daily and I know it’s not my internet because all the other apps on my phone work perfectly. The amount of crash I’ve seen is uncanny. If I had a penny for every crash I’ve seen on this app I probably would have enough to pay for a one year subscription

title: Need subtitles in more languages
review: The app is great and the content is great, just one thing you could add to make it better. Subtitles in more languages such as Japanese, Korean, Chinese etc…… and make these languages available in all of the content like Game of Thrones, Westworld etc….then this app will be 5 star!

title: This is a really good app
review: I love this app I love the movies I give this 5 stars because you guys go out your way to fix all the bugs…the app works fine with me no problems at all 5 star app my opinion ❣️

review:

All my other apps work fine. But HBO MAX is a double eye poke. 
Hope you guys fix this.

title: Love the Content, Hate the App
review:
Your content is incredible. Definitely premium. 

However, your app is so buggy, I am considering cancellation. I cannot view the incredible content if the vessel of viewing does not work. 

I’ve downloaded content on regular wifi, received confirmation of those downloads, but I can not view any downloads for enjoyment. I am on a plane right now and was hoping to watch my shows I downloaded. Unfortunately, I was fooled and now am unprepared for my long flight without wifi and downloaded content. 

This is disappointing and kinda ridiculous. 2Stars because the content. 0 stars from the app.

title: No password import from iPhone to apple tv
review: App stops playing videos on Apple TV, have to delete app and reinstall to get to work.  First have to reenter password, does it import from the passwords on your iPhone? Nope!  Have to manually enter using the remote, because you can’t type using the iPhone keypad and view the strong password at the same time.  Have to leave the password up on phone and use Apple TV remote.

HBO took a pretty good app and reverted it back 2 years. Watching content is borderline sad. Undo the update.

title: No longer usable
review:
Recently resubscribed to watch Barry, Station Eleven. Worked fine. Affter the first 5 of 6 episodes  of Time Traveler’s Wife, we could not finish the final episode because it would stop playing for long periods. Finally had to quit and unsubscribe just two days into a new month.

title: If you travel - DO NOT USE.  Absolutely worthless.
review:
I travel a lot, and therefore like to watch downloaded content online.  Netflix for example, does this perfectly.  

HBO Max will NOT allow you to watch your downloaded content offline in airplane mode.  Yes, as insane as that sounds that is the case.  

I would give zero stars for this app if I could.  I’m doing whatever I can to get my first month of fees back out of principle.

title: Terrible
review: Only thing that saves HBO is the shows that Netflix doesn’t have. Stops the screen even though I see the subtitles change so the show keeps going. Absolutely horrible app and super annoying.

I’m almost ready to give up and just cancel the subscription, it’s not like there is much good new content on here anyway.

title: Downloading episodes
review:
I still have not used the app other than to download episodes to watch on the plane, and the app keeps dropping every time i click on multiple downloads. There is a limit before the app crashes and i have to reopen it and try again. 

Generally love hbo, but this app is already disappointing.

title: Great content, horrible app.
review:
I love HBO. I’ve had an HBO service for most of my life. 

However, this app is the worst streaming app of them all and makes me not want to subscribe to their service. Basic keyboard commands (space bar to pause, etc.) are not present. It’s just a pain to watch anything on HBO via this app.

Do the people at HBO actually use this app? It’s literally the worst of them all.

title: Half the time you won’t be able to play anything.
review: Great content. Horrible app. Condescending customer service. No fix. Wasted money. I do not recommend. Update: I contacted customer support 3 different times to “trouble shoot my device “. They were extremely condescending and the problem was never fixed nor did they provide any resolution.

It’s bad enough my hand is tired from browsing because your app doesn’t swipe or move like ANY OTHER APP ON THE APPLE TV. Idiots. And when I want to search I’m not able to use the remote mic/Siri. And now I have a headache.

review: This app went from awful to great. There are like, no issues anymore. And you can even zoom. It is a much easier app to use!!

title: Satisfaction with Hbomax
review: I’ve been a subscriber of hbomax for a year now love the shows you have all my shows from the childhood on here I love the suspense category of it the most instead of Netflix&chill now it’s hbomax & chill for me.

title: Can’t watch TV-MA on this app
review:
I love all of the selection that this app provides but whenever I try to watch TV-MA content on my phone it says content blocked even though I can watch the same TV-MA content on the same profile on computer and TV.
I have been looking everywhere on the internet for a fix but couldn't find one.
I have no parental controls on my account and it is a parent account.
Please fix.

title: Good but really buggy
review: Whenever I try to watch something I haven’t watched in a while it says I’m offline even though I’m connected to the internet.

title: Pointless
review: The app is great if you’re at home connected to your own internet. In that case, I could just use my smart TV. I downloaded a few movies for a plane ride and couldn’t access a single one because I “didn’t have a good connection”. I assumed that, much like all the other streaming services I have, if I downloaded something.. I would be able to access it without internet.
